_comment26: They forgot to add 'bucket' to the bucket items
advancements.yttr.obtain_xl_iron_ingot.d: Obtain Big Iron by smelting Raw Yttrium
advancements.yttr.obtain_yttrium_ingot.d: Obtain an Yttrium Ingot by blasting Raw Yttrium
block.createbigcannons.smoke_shell.toolt: Covers the battlefield with a _smoke cloud_ that obscures vision.
block.createbigcannons.unbored_very_larg: Unbored Very Large Nethersteel Cannon Layer
block.createbigcannons.unbored_very_smal: Unbored Very Small Nethersteel Cannon Layer
block.dbe.light_blue_gilded_steel_tank: Light Blue Gilded Andesite Iron Tank
block.dbe.light_gray_gilded_steel_tank: Light Gray Gilded Andesite Iron Tank
createbigcannons.ponder.cannon_crafting/: A built-up cannon block must have all the correct layers to be transformed.
It takes a while for the cannon layers to transform into cannon blocks.
createbigcannons.ponder.munitions/adding: Adding tracers to big cannon projectiles
In addition to autocannon munitions, tracers can also be added to big cannon projectiles.
Unlike fuzing, tracer tips can be applied to any side of the projectile block.
Right-click the projectile with an empty hand to remove any tracers present.
As with fuzing, tracer application can be automated with Deployers.
createbigcannons.ponder.munitions/cannon: A cannon's material has two main factors that can cause the cannon to fail; its minimum projectile velocity per barrel and its strength.
createbigcannons.ponder.tag.cannon_craft: How to manufacture cannons of different sizes and calibers
createbigcannons.ponder.tag.munitions.de: Blocks and items used by cannons, and what they can do
createbigcannons.ponder.tag.operating_ca: How to use cannons safely and effectively
custommachinery.astralsignals.drive_eras: 会清除任意种类的驱动器内容，让它变为空白驱动器！
death.attack.createbigcannons.machine_gu: %s was punctured by machine gun fire
Cannon block at [%s, %s, %s] should be reversed
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests0.description0: 上方是荒地，下方有很多空腔。这个地方某些东西我们很熟悉，也很扭曲。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests0.description2: 同样的力量吞噬了月球，我能感觉到它。这里形成了一个完整的生态系统——整个世界都是他的巢穴。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests0.subtitle: 星辰终章
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests0.title: 时光遗落的世界
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests1.description0: &5末地&r侵吞万物，维度生而倾覆。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests1.description2: Yet there's something intriguing about an inevitable End. Harvest the fruits. We have everything we need for a greater form of Astral Conduit.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests1.subtitle: 命中注定
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests10.description: Press Delicace to harden it further into a usable material to encase a new machine.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests10.subtitle: Not to eat off of...
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests10.title: Ender Plating
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests11.description: It's alive! The combination of Pure Carbon, Enderslime, an Eye of Ender and our beloved Shimmer creates... Life?
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests11.subtitle: Shimmer me timbers!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests11.title: 活体机械
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests12.description: Who'd have thought that you'd be able to make good food down here!
Shimmered apples provide lots of saturation and some light health regen.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests12.subtitle: 尝起来甜滋滋的！
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests12.title: Shimmered Apple
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests13.description: Blazes can't say no to the excrement of an unfathomable entity!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests13.subtitle: Irresistable!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests13.title: New Blaze Cake Automation
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests14.subtitle: Zwoop
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests15.subtitle: But where's the Dragon Egg?
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests16.description: Uncover what items really are. This machine will split items down into its finest parts, turning an item into a maximum of four outputs.

The Yttric Centrifuge requires a burnable fuel in the lower left slot as an input. This can be automatically inputted via an input into the side using a Funnel or Hopper. Items can be output through the bottom face of the block.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests16.subtitle: Purification Station
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests17.description: Put 16 Coal into the middle of the Centrifuge, and a burnable fuel item in the fuel slot.
When the Centrifuge detects a valid item, it will start tumbling the item until it is broken down into its factors.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests18.description: Thick saliva found in pools within the bowels of this dimension. It stinks.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests18.subtitle: Digest This
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests18.title: Sputum
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests19.description: Sputum digests Enderslime Crystals, softening them.
This Mush will be easier to work with.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests19.subtitle: Ender Slop
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests19.title: Ender Mush
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests2.description0: A foul odour, like the inside of an animal, fills the air of the world below the surface. The ground is slimy, and purple crystals form in the ground.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests2.description2: Harvest the excrement of a greater force. These Crystals echo with power.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests2.subtitle: The End, Crystallised
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests20.description: With solid Rubble production, we can comfortably crush good amounts of it to release the Debris inside.
Signs of the past show up within every inch of this place.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests20.subtitle: De Brie
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests20.title: Fully Automatable Debris
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests21.description: The highly-conductive Gold now purified to its finest form.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests21.subtitle: Don't let a Piglin see this
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests21.title: Ultrapure Gold
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests22.description: The durability of Ancient Debris and the conductivity of Gold. The perfect mix for use in powerful tools and machinery.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests22.subtitle: Nether Right
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests23.description: Utilising the &6Basin Foundry Lid&r, Ender Mush can be melted down into Metabolic Broth, a processed form of stomach acid. It has a oddly comforting smell compared to Sputum.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests23.subtitle: The Belly of the Beast
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests23.title: Metabolic Broth
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests24.description: Carbon, a part of all life. Using the Desizer, compress it into a highly dense form.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests24.subtitle: Ultra Compression
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests25.description: When cooled, Metabolic Broth forms into an odd gummy food, like a sugary sweet.

It's somewhat medicinal, granting health benefits that increase the potency of positive potion effects and soften the impact of negative effects. It also aids in digestion, improving the benefits of food items.
Don't eat your whole supply though, you will be needing it!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests25.subtitle: DO NOT EAT (optional)
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests26.description: A direct upgrade to the Void Cleaver. Shift + Right-Click a block to cut it into a new shape.
This iteration of the Void Cleaver also acts as an &6omnitool&r, mining as any tool type and applying &rstacks of Bleed&r when used as a weapon.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests26.subtitle: Upgrade!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests27.description: A metal present in significant quantities in Monazite.
Cannot be found naturally in its metallic form, but can be extracted from Crushed Monazite.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests27.subtitle: The magnetic element
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests27.title: Neodymium
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests28.description: Ancient Debris is a compound of a world's history. The Centrifuge will break it down into its finest moments
Place 1 Ancient Debris into a Centrifuge to get Ultrapure Debris and a bit of Rubble
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests28.subtitle: Automating Rubble
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests28.title: Ultrapure Debris
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests29.description: Monazite Crystals can be found in the Warped Forest biome.
Due its tough composition, you will have to use a pair of Crushing Wheels to break it down into its elements: Yttrium and Neodymium.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests29.subtitle: Monazite
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests29.title: Monazite Crystal
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests3.description0: 介绍：空间压缩器——一种专门用于缩小的多方块结构。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests3.description2: 空间压缩器由1个空间压缩器控制器和8个空间压缩器外壳组成。如果你想装饰装饰它，你可以用切石机加工一下它的外壳。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests3.description4: 按住【w】键可以观看一个简易的教程，这个教程会告诉你空间压缩器的样子和工作方式。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests3.subtitle: 试试这个尺码
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests3.title: 空间压缩器
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests30.description: Hold [w] on the Sturdy Cage to see how to craft it using the Desizer.
To summon a &5Great Beast&r, we need a Sacrifice. This cage of Sturdy Blocks will be able to contain it.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests30.subtitle: To Store a Sacrifice
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests30.title: Sturdy Cage
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests31.description: An Ender Watcher will make for the perfect sacrifice. Its cry will echo throughout the sky.

Using a &bSnare&r, capture an Ender Watcher and quickly put it into the Sturdy Cage. Remember that Snares can not contain mobs forever. Lower the HP of the Ender Watcher to keep it contained in the Snare for longer.
If you haven't had the pleasure of meeting one yet, Ender Watchers are giant jellyfish that roam the Warped Forest and Small End Islands biomes.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests31.title: Contained End
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests32.description: Shimmer, the blood of reality. Combined with Compressed Ultrapure Carbon, a frame for a conduit is within grasp.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests32.subtitle: Shimmers...
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests32.title: Ultramatter
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests33.description: With a 3x3x3 cube of any of these Biomass materials, we can use the Desizer to create Charcoal and Coal blocks.
Charcoal Blocks can be turned back into Coal Blocks using the Chromatic Vacuum with just a Right-Click.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests33.subtitle: Compacting Biomass
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests33.title: Fuel for the Fire
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests34.description: Locate the Scorched Shrine and call upon a &5Great Beast&r.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests34.subtitle: Die With Honour.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests34.title: O' Beast of Ender,
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests35.description: 距离上次Create Astral更新&b过了一年半了都&r……现在我们的版本号更新到了&bv2.1&r，真是艰辛的旅途啊。
2023年那会机械动力星辰更新了v2.0，当时下载量还只有一万，但现在的下载量已经&b超过百万&r。
我对机械动力：星辰的玩家们、以及社区的各位要说的是，我对你们的感激之情简直难以言表。还包括&6屏幕前的你&r，毕竟你等了这么久才等来完整版整合包！
&c将会在ver2.1修复&r这句话成了个社区meme了已经，毕竟这次更新因为各种原因时间间隔拉的很长。我希望各位玩“完整版”机械动力：星辰的时候能尽兴。
&b我想让你们知道的是&r：我看着机械动力：星辰这个2022年的项目一步步走到现在，有了完整的玩家社区，逐渐变为成熟的整合包，挺让我泪目的。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests35.subtitle: &d真正的结局。&r
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests35.title: 星辰奇点
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests36.description: Celestial Ring forged across all of space. While equipped, grants 1.5x damage to most attacks.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests36.subtitle: The Journey Makes Us Stronger
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests37.description: The ultimate crowd control. Weld a mystic boxing glove, punching through enemies with the force of a meteor.

Punches deal more damage the faster they are travelling when they hit a mob. Their initial velocity is also effected by your own velocity, travelling further when you are sprinting forwards. There is no cap to the amount of possible damage.
Melee attacks will launch mobs into the air. Shift + Right-Click to uppercut.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests37.subtitle: Papapap
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests38.description: A direct upgrade to the Yttric Rifle, as long as you can time it correctly.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests38.subtitle: Void Survivor
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests39.subtitle: Have we been here before?
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests39.title: Ruined Technology
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests4.description2: 右击任意方块以创造一个临时的穿墙隧道。走快点，隧道可不会等你出去了再关闭。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests4.description4: 虚空效应器用虚空作为它的燃料，右键虚空流体源方块可以给它加满燃料。
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests4.subtitle: 嗡~
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests40.description: Cobblestone can be mixed with Rubble to make its Ruined counterpart.
Ruined Cobblestone can then be crushed back into Rubble, with a chance of one bonus Rubble. As long as you save at least one Rubble to make more Ruined Cobblestone, you can automate Rubble.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests40.subtitle: The Past, Crumbling
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests40.title: Ruined Cobblestone
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests41.subtitle: I believe in you!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests41.title: Automate Rubble!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests42.description: Zapping Neodymium will irradiate it, promoting the growth of Promethium Lumps
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests42.subtitle: Now with less dust and more curves!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests42.title: Neodymium 2
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests43.description: Now we're getting somewhere! These batteries will be used to power the next machines. Don't worry, they have a very long battery life.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests43.subtitle: Slightly better than AAA
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests44.description: The Projector will place a rainbow platform below you. Continuing to hold Right-Click will create a long platform to wherever you desire.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests44.subtitle: The rainbow road
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests45.description: The Shifter replaces blocks with a 'paint bucket tool' function. Hold a block in your offhand to replace any placed blocks with that block. Works with Void-Cleaved blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests45.subtitle: SwipSwapper
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests46.description: A Fluid Tank of Metabolic Broth with a Centrifuge on top will output Sputum into a Fluid Tank on top. This process will give a net gain in Sputum
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests46.subtitle: Sputum Automation
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests46.title: Salivation
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests47.description: Like a conveyor belt.. but goopy.. and faster..
Lay this goop on the ground and apply a direction for a major speed boost. Fill your walkways with this to get around much faster.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests47.subtitle: NYEOWM
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests48.subtitle: The future clashes with the past
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests48.title: Forces of Nature
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests49.description: Gadolinite is a compound of a few useful elements. Break it down, girl.
You can also break down &5Enderrack&r and &eEnd Stone&r in the Yttric Centrifuge. Try it out!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests49.subtitle: Centrifuge that compound!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests49.title: Refine Gadolinite
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests5.description2: Rubble is present underground and in structures on the surface. Some of these blocks look familiar...
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests5.description4: The past carries a lot of power. You will want to gather lots of this.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests5.subtitle: The Past, Reduced
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests5.title: 碎石
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests50.description: At the top of the dimension, islands of fire and ash float high.
You will find Shrines of Scorched Obsidian. Bring a &6Root of Continuity&r to the shrine, and Right-Click on the highest block in the center pillar. You may want to stand back.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests50.subtitle: Summon the Beast
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests50.title: Shrine atop the Old World
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests51.description: When you activate the Holster at the top of the middle pillar, it will glow red.
Right-Click the Holster block with a &6Netherite Knife&r to scrape a Haemopal from it.
The Haemopal can be processed into crafting materials to help you summon another &5Great Beast&r.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests51.subtitle: Cheers, Pal
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests52.subtitle: Gotta mine em all
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests52.title: Ores of the Old World
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests6.description0: Enderslime Crystals contain small quantities of Promethium, in the form of pin-sized specks.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests6.description2: A strange reaction occurs between Enderslime Crystals and Rubble, resulting in the decay of the crystal, almost as if the history of this place clashes with the present.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests6.description4: Mix the two conflicting materials together to extract Promethium Specks from the Enderslime Crystals.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests6.subtitle: It's not just a speck!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests7.description0: To be useful, the rare Promethium must be grown into a larger mass.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests7.description2: Neodymium, another element found in this world, is used in the production of Promethium isotopes.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests7.description4: The process involves irradiating Neodymium while it is present among the existing Promethium.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests7.subtitle: Grow up!
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests8.description0: Excellent, feel the radiation in the palm of your hands. However, to be used to power machinery, we must grow the Promethium one last time.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests8.description2: ...cus what's a tech modpack without a little repetition?
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests8.subtitle: Glow up~
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests9.description0: Eating &6Crystal Estrogen Pills&r will grant you the &6Girl Power II&r effect.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests9.description2: &6Girl Power II&r makes you twice as girl, allowing you to perform &62 midair dashes&r instead of just 1.
ftbquests.chapter.6.quests9.subtitle: Even more Girl Power!
ftbquests.chapter.6.title: 第6章 末地
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests0.descrip: 质地极脆，但挥舞速度像光一样快，而且升级槽位不是一般的多。如果使用的当的话，这个材料根本没有对手。
Mix Radiant Residue with a Chromatic Compound to absorb the pure light into it. This produces Refined Radiance.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests1.descrip: &6Refined Shimmer&r is a substance holding immense chromatic potential, but it's not quite there yet.
By superheating all 16 Blaze Burners under the Shimmer Refinery, and pumping Shimmer + Refining Agents into its slots, you will begin to process Refined Shimmer.
你最好做一大堆烈焰蛋糕，比如16个烈焰蛋糕就不错：把它们一次全烧了的热量足够做30个精炼闪光！
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests1.title: 星际粉尘，星辰齑粉
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests10.descri: 以前干过这事吧，把新电路板胚上加点耐热合金钉脚，做出新的电路板！
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests10.title: 耐热合金针脚
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests11.descri: This rocket is &bnot limited by the bounds of spacetime&r.
我们要做的事，首先必须抛却一切理性。
这 绝 不 可 能。
这就是一切的源头，这就是毁灭之源。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests11.subtit: Are you prepared for what comes next?
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests11.title: A rocket to break the barrier between realities.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests12.descri: 再做一个基岩粉碎机，咱们得再深入些。
Breaking Bedrock with the Yttric Rifle above Y=-64 will give you bedrock shards, but we can go deeper than that.
摧毁掉世界最低层的基岩（-64层），解放其中的虚空。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests12.title: 超越边界
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests13.descri: For progression you will want to become familiar with the &6explosive shot&r, but feel free to become acquainted with the modes at your disposal!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests13.title: &6直指&r群星。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests14.descri: Stand well clear, this stuff is not to swim in... not yet...
虚空在呼唤你呢……拿个桶，铜管道，什么都行，把它捡起来，我们需要它。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests14.title: 虚空
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests15.descri: 虚空互相连接从无断口，用这套潜水设备后，你就可以安全的进入虚空间歇泉。现在准备好通过虚空前往别的“裸露口”吧。
你需要潜水服调节站和潜水胸甲，别傻呆呆的在虚空间歇泉玩水了！
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests15.title: 虚空潜水设备
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests16.descri: 圈套可以右击抓住怪物，但是，
抓到的怪物有生命倒计时，怪物血量越高，倒计时越低。把怪物打到残血可以有效增加生命时间。
如果倒计时没了，怪就上西天了。小心点！
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests16.title: 哇袄！
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests17.descri: 你没法从虚空开始自动化钇，所以先去挖矿！
我很确定一点，以后肯定会有生产它的好办法的……
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests17.title: 开始搭建钇处理线。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests18.descri: 耐热金属和钇不一样，它不需要花里胡哨的处理。
只需要用熔化炉或者用烈焰血加热的熔铸炉，把粗矿或者粉碎矿融化再浇筑就行。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests18.subtit: 这天儿好特么热啊（原文为西班牙语）
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests18.title: 现在异彩矿需求最大。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests19.descri: 耐热金属制品有很多用。
For now, you are likely only going to want to produce Cinnabar and Calorite Pins.
不过，钇需要用耐热金属实现自动化，所以你得准备一大堆的粗耐热金属……
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests2.descrip: Lithium and Calorite will allow for the creation of cool new circuits with tasty capabilities...
The process for this one will be familiar with the ones you made in Chapter 4. These utilise Calorite Pins and Lithium,
As you are fairly adept at using REI at this point, I will spare the details on it's creation.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests2.title: 不是吧大哥，怎么还要做电路板啊？
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests20.descri: &l只需要往虚空流体中丢入&6异彩化合物&r&l即可。&r
虚空会接受你的礼物，返还它的馈赠。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests20.title: Creation of a dark compound.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests21.title: Mix for liquid light
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests22.descri: Used for its properties of being incredibly lightweight, radiant casing in unmatched as both an ingredient...
Apply Refined Radiance to Advanced Casings to obtain.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests23.descri: Boasting toughness beyond known constraints, Shadowsteel is obtained through applying Shadow Steel to Advanced Casings.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests24.subtit: The first round of crushing begins!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests24.title: Crushing to Crushed Yttrium.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests25.descri: Once you have combined your choice of Ad Astra ingot with Molten Yttrium, an ingot will form.
It's not quick, it's not easy, but it's a powerful metal.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests25.title: Forming Yttrium Ingots
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests26.subtit: Millstones or Crushing Wheels will get the job done!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests26.title: Converting to powder.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests27.subtit: Melting to Yttrium fluid, and mixing with chromatic metals.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests28.descri: Before hopping into a Void Spout and being obliterated, consider equipping a suit of Diving gear, filling it up at a Diving Station and standing atop a Diving Plate to initiate a deep dive.

Checkpoints between all Void Spouts in the Overworld with Diving Plates will be created, which the diver can instantly fast travel between at little cost. Perfect for setting up huge cross-Overworld transport networks.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests28.title: Diving Board for Void?
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests29.descri: You need to manage three resources to Dive safely: Fuel, Oxygen and Hull Integrity.

Fuel will aid movement under a bulky Diving Suit and the immense pressure of the Void. Oxygen will keep you breathing. Hull Integrity will counteract the hostile nature of the Void, preventing your Diving Suit from imploding with you in it.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests3.descrip: Home to the most hazardous terrain of any planet you've seen so far, Mercury holds lucrative returns for those brave enough to explore it.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests3.title: 欢迎来到宇宙的热寂
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests30.descri: The first (productive) thing to do with this rifle will be to split open a block of bedrock.
When placing a bedrock smasher on a piece of bedrock above Y=-64 (Not touching the void), the device will penetrate straight through its unbreakable core.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests30.title: Smashing!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests31.descri: After that brutal display, against the specific piece of bedrock you chose in particular, you may mine the fruit of your labour.
From the remnants will drop a bedrock shard. With this you may infuse Yttrium with Bedrock, creating a new variant of plate.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests31.subtit: You'll only need one of these for full plating automation!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests31.title: Little chip of destiny.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests32.descri: Complementary Schematic included to assist with building.
(Refunds cannot be processed at this time)
The &6Shimmer Refinery&r will be your &6only method of obtaining Refined Shimmer&r, a substance with some of the purest raw energy in the universe.
16 Blaze Burners must be superheated during processing to allow the Shimmer filling the tanks to be heated enough to be purified.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests32.subtit: Refined Shimmer in a bottle, or four.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests32.title: The Blaze-Cake Eater 9000
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests33.title: Densely Packed Yttrium!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests34.descri: Compressing a small amount of Radiant Residue will cause Star Shards to crystallise.
Process these Shards into a Pure Star Shard. This can then be converted into a Nether Star, or melted down into a greater yield of Radiant Residue.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests34.title: Infinitely Renewing Light Itself
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests37.descri: Shimmer and The Void. Two opposite forces clashing to produce a powder we can use to split compounds
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests37.title: &b拆分剂&r
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests39.descri: Whilst not serving a purpose of their own, these Magtanks act as part of the structure for the &6Shimmer Refinery&r.
Rather than pumping into them, pump Shimmer directly into the refinery machine block instead!

&6NOTICE:&r It is known that attempting to shift click an item into the UI will crash the users client. I have received exclusive commentary from the Pack Developer to "Please don't do that", and, "We warned them in advance".
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests39.subtit: Tanks to withhold the temperature of the Sun.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests39.title: The ever-durable Magtank.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests4.descrip: 又是科技复兴的一堆升级。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests4.title: 科技复兴工具的超级加强版
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests41.descri: A slower Yttric Rifle, but much more stable.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests42.descri: &6Molten Uranium&r does not possess properties in its current form to be useful to us.
By casting it into a rod, we may soon use its energy potential within machines to maximise their potential...
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests42.title: Turns out, it's safer than you think!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests43.descri: &6Uranium Residue&r can be extracted from Yttrium Powder using an Industrial Centrifuge.
It is unknown the exact chemical properties of Yttrium, but the presence of this material within it sparks a greater question as to why we are so comfortable holding it in our hands.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests43.title: Is this safe to touch?
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests44.descri: The Distillation Tower Multiblock from Chapter 4 supports superheating as a condition of recipes. By lighting it up with 9 Blaze Cakes, the heat will be enough to process this Uranium Residue into a purer form.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests44.title: Distillation Tower on Overdrive
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests45.descri: A selection of gear, traditionally used more for its ceremonial potential, rather than its combat capability.
There will be no other player on the battleground as royal as those who wear gear made with light itself.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests45.title: Radiant Arsenal
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests46.descri: By completing a chain of Calorite to Mercury, a solid source of this material can be procured, ready to process.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests46.title: A source of Mercury.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests47.descri: An Electric Guitar, the ultimate weapon of mass destruction.
Hit enemies with melee attacks to charge up the E Guitar to a maximum of 5 notes. After at least 3 hits, Right Click to unleash the stored energy as a piercing bolt of lightning.
If we're slaying beasts, why not make a song of it?
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests48.descri: Glassy Void is a classier variant of Tinted Glass, blocking light while allowing you to see through.
&lTo create it, throw a Bedrock Shard into Void fluid.&r
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests49.title: Illumination Shot
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests5.descrip: 任何装载&6铀杆&r的机器工作效率都会大大上升，只要你不怕被辐射搞短寿就行。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests5.title: 实际上你可以徒手抓着它！
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests50.title: Teleport Shot
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests51.subtit: Destructive, that's what you like, right?
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests51.title: Explosive Shot
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests52.title: Beam Shot
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests53.descri: For 50%% more effecient ammo usage, fill up Rifle Canisters at the Canister Filler.
The Canister filler takes a single Empty Rifle Canister, one of the four ammo ingredients, and a bottle of Glowdamp
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests54.descri: Glowdamp is the glowing gas that illuminates Shroomlight blocks.

It can be extracted by placing a Shroomlight block inbetween two Yttrium Blocks, and pushing the two Yttrium Blocks together using a piston. This will crush the Shroomlight inbetween, and release the gas into the air. Collect the Glowdamp gas using a Glass Bottle.
The Glowdamp can then be used to create Lamps and Lazers, and will be used to fill Rifle Canisters later on.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests54.title: Glowdamp
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests55.descri: Utilise Glowdamp to light up your world with a rainbow of new Redstone-powered lamps.
Use REI to see how the Lamp can be Inverted, dyed, and used to create Lazors!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests56.descri: Whilst bearing no practical use, these beams can be used as decoration, light shows, or even a fun way to (temporarily) blind someone!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests56.title: Imma firin mah lazor!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests57.subtit: Crush Mercury Cobblestone for Calorite automation (and others).
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests57.title: &6The Stone Growth Chamber returns.&r
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests58.descri: Pouring &6Void&r over a Raw Calorite Block (automated from Mercury Cobblestone) will form a block of Yttrium.
From here, break it down into individual pieces and continue the processing chain as usual. Automatable Uranium and Yttrium!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests58.title: &6Automating Yttrium.&r
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests59.descri: Superheated mix the brightest substances known to you:
All under the molecule-splitting power of a Separation Agent, crafted with the purest of Void...
You may find that Radiance fluid is particularly simple to automate once you have overcome the initial amount... by manufacturing your own artifical Nether Stars.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests6.descrip: 将&6暗影钢流体&r倒在你的钢上，将会制造出全宇宙最强的金属之一。
好好使用这种材料的力量，暗影钢作为匠魂武器配件来说潜力无穷。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests6.subtitl: 一种坚不可摧的工匠材料
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests60.descri: Superheated mix the darkest substances known to you:
All under the molecule splitting power of a Separation Agent, crafted with the purest of Void...
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests61.descri: Upon creating &6Radiant Residue&r and &6Shadow Fluid&r, the process for &cMercurian Stone&r becomes available.
Designed as an extension to the Moon Portal -> Mars Portal Chain, the Mercury portal must be created on Mars and is once again lit with an Astral Conduit.

&6WARNING:&r It is advised you be careful, as the portal will always send you back from Mercury to Mars, meaning if you built the portal in the Overworld you may not have a way back anymore! Make sure to always chain Moon portals -> Mars portals -> Mercury portals.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests61.title: &6A Portal From Mars to Mercury?&r
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests62.descri: This can in turn be melted down into &6Mercury&r
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests62.title: First step to Mercury.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests63.descri: The Void Cleaver can slice blocks along a flat plane, allowing you to turn any solid block into a flexible slope block. Decorative and functional - Use this to build ramps with any block!
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests7.descrip: This quirky little compound is the purest form of colour. It is practically begging to be turned into Refined Radiance or Shadow Steel.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests7.subtitl: 一种颇具机械创意的材料
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests7.title: 异彩化合物
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests8.descrip: Thanks to rapid accelerations in technology, the jet suit will provide an unbeatable defense, alongside flight capability.
Utilise the &6Jet Suit Flash Card&r from Per Aspera to control your flight more delicately, allowing for movement akin to creative flight, at the cost of its fuel...
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests8.title: 起飞咯
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests9.descrip: 这个超能合金会因不明原因而颤动。
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.quests9.title: The connection of Dark and Light.
ftbquests.chapter.6_raow.title: 第5章 亚原子

Hephaestus tools can be &6repaired&r in the Tinker Station using the material used for the "head".
Alternatively, you can make &6Repair Kits&r to repair items using the crafting grid.
Later on, you will also be able to apply &6modifiers&r to improve the tool, for example to mine faster, to deal more damage, or to gain new abilities.

给我看看你的本事，如果你可以完成其中的两项任务，我才会考虑把拖拉机给你。只要你能布置好一场老少皆宜的盛宴，我就会相信你。现在赶紧给我做饭去！

As a reward, you'll receive a &6Tinker's Encyclopedia&r - a compendium of currently known tools from books you obtained so far, with detailed explanation about the tool traits.
在匠魂工作站中组合工具部件来制作你的第一把匠魂工具。
这些方块可以把所有的懒人厨房方块连在一起，所以可以用它作为你的厨房地板。

The only new ore you are going to find in the overworld is &6Tin!&r
It is noteworthy that we do not expect you to go mining for ores as your main income of metal as you progress, &6explore REI&r for potential ways to automate the creation of these materials!
- If you are new to &6Create&r, use the &6Ponder&r feature (hold the [W] key while hovering over an item), or online guides to learn how Create works.
- Your first tools are made using &6Hephaestus&r (Fabric port of &6Tinker's Construct&r). Make a Tinker Station and a Part Builder to get started!
- Speaking of Hephaestus: &7Smeltery&r is disabled in this pack! Alloying is done with &6Create&r's Mechanical Mixers instead.
There's no Nether in this pack! Instead, you go to the &6Moon&r later on via a portal.
Content that would normally be in the Nether is distributed across different celestial bodies.
- This pack is centered mainly around &6Create&r, &6Tech Reborn&r, &6Ad Astra&r, and later on... &6Yttr!&r
- This pack changes a ton of recipes! Be sure to check out &6REI&r (the recipe viewer to the right of your inventory).
Left-click an item in the list to view its recipe.
Right-click an item to show the usages of the item.
(You can also do that with items in your inventory by pressing R and U respectively)
&6Single Drawer&r can store 1 different items, 2048 (16x64) items per slot.
> &6Lava Bucket&r - If a drawer is full and new items are inserted, those items will be voided instead.
> &6Drawer Lock&r - Locks the drawer to the specified item.
> &6Black Dye&r - Hides the item preview and count.
> &6Drawer Upgrades&r - Increases the maximum amount of items that can be stored in a slot:
&6Double Drawer&r can store 2 different items, 1024 (16x64) items per slot.
> &6Drawer Downgrades&r: Reduces max size of a slot to 64.
&6Quad Drawer&r can store 4 different items, 512 (16x64) items per slot.
They can be broken, retaining their contents.
Contains all recipes for Drink Beer.

Tip: Copper makes for a great Hephaestus tool material!
A pioneer's first piece of industry...

ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests1: 基本压印模板，其三：
如果你还没法存储它的话，那就得赶紧去准备下了！
你现在应该有一定储量的闪光溶液了！
你需要多多制作这个种子来建造更大的AE2网络。
建议你按10到20个为一组批量生产，一个一个做太痛苦了。
处理器
闪光玻璃线缆最多可以承载8个频道，超出频道限制时，更远的设备无法接收频道，因此无法工作。
智能线缆会在Jade（中上部的方块信息）上显示使用的频道数量，方块上也会以多条线的形式显示出来。
大概是你会用到的第一件物品
任意 #ae2:glass_cable
任意 #ae2:smart_cable
最初的线缆
AE2的所有设备都会消耗一个频道，而线缆可以传输频道。这一点之后详细展开说，现在你需要知道的是：ME控制器的每一个面都可以提供32个频道，而没有控制器的网络最多只能处理8个频道。
（本任务只需要一样物品即可完成）
该搞大工程了！
ME系统弹射起步
致密线缆的功能和你想象的一样：它能传输整整32个频道！
而玻璃线缆的功能则和致密线缆完全不一样：它只能传输AE能量，而不能传输频道，也就是说它不能在ME网络中正常工作。玻璃线缆常用于传输能量和创建子网，这一点之后详细说。
为工程师们量身打造！
高级线缆
ME驱动器可以存放你的存储单元，而每个存储单元都有特定的大小，可以存放63个种类的物品。对于那些储量较大的物品，建议你做大一些的单元来存放它们。
ME驱动器也可以组成多方块结构，只需要给其中一个接上线缆，结构里所有的驱动器都可以接入网络。不过每个驱动器还是会占用一个频道！
（关于频道的信息可在左侧支线查看）
这个方块可以放入10个存储单元！
查看物品
子网主要用于建立特定的生产线，比如通过一系列的处理配方制造某种资源。
这些小规模的网络可以用石英纤维线缆与主网络连接，由主网络为其提供能量。这种连接方式等效于使用了能源接收器，也就是说子网可以使用8个频道。
当你通过ME接口向网络输入物品时，物品会立即存入对应的主网ME系统，也即你可以从子网输出物品到主网。
子网
元件工作台是很好用的工具！
它有两个功能：
1. 你可以给你的元件添加过滤器，使其只能接收特定的流体或物品——这就是所谓的&n格式化&r。
2. 你可以给元件添加卡片：
- &eInverter Card&r - Causes the filter to be a deny-list rather than allow-list.
- &eFuzzy Card&r - The cell disregards NBT when filtering items. You can also set a durability treshold to only accept items with more than desired durability.
- &eEqual Distribution Card&r - Ensures equal maximum amount of items for every type in the cell.
- &eOverflow Destruction Card&r - If the Cell is full or the quota managed by Equal Distribution Card would be exceeded, the items will be &nvoided&r instead of filling up other cells.
不想所有的元件都被同种物品占满？
自定义你的存储元件
Do you remember the blaze spawner you needed for Blaze Rods or to fill empty Blaze Burners? This thing has got you covered.
Then, place a Spatial IO Port anywhere on the network.
Insert your Spatial Storage Cell into the Spatial IO Port, give the Port a Redstone signal...
...and your structure ends up in the Spatial Storage!
Some additional facts:
- Once a structure of a given size was stored in the Spatial Storage Cell, that Cell won't work for dimensions other than the dimension that was initially stored.
- Bigger Spatial Containment Chambers have a higher energy cost to store a structure.
- To increase the efficiency of larger Spatial Containment Chambers, you can place additional sets of Pylons 1 block outside of the structure to store.
Be aware that each set of Pylons uses up a channel, so you might need an ME Controller for bigger structures.

First, craft yourself the items listed in the quest, PLUS the desired size of Spatial Cell, each having their block capacity in the tooltip. The smallest one, for example, can carry a volume of 2x2x2 blocks.
Then, to define the bounding box of your structure, place Spatial Pylons outside of the bounding box.

A 2-long line of Pylons in north/south direction, 2-long line in east/west, and 2-long line in up/down directions is the required amount for storing a 1x1x1 structure (like the aforementioned Spawner).
This setup is called a "Spatial Containment Chamber". There can be only one on the given network.
有用的东西来了
Moving BLOCKS like a Pro
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests2: 基本压印模板，其一：
What if your cabling became too long, or you need to go across dimensions?!
The Quantum Bridge can move up to 32 channels cross-dimensionally.
But remember that both sides need to be chunkloaded in order for the Bridge to work!
The Quantum Bridge got you covered.
To build a Quantum Bridge, surround the ME Quantum Link Chamber with ME Quantum Rings.
Put one of your Quantum Entangled Singularities into the Link Chamber, and the other one in the Link Chamber of the Bridge at your desired destination.
The Bridge has been established, and the network is now operational in multiple places.
This is beefy for your power, though - consumes 100 E/t when operational!
I hate cabling!
啊……还是来了，P2P通道，直接来吧（P2P意思是Point-to-point，也即点对点）
在输入总线上插入相应的类型后，输出端将立即显示该类型。
注意：所有P2P通道都需要消耗能量，并且每个通道也会占用一个频道，记得合理安排能量和频道。当你用P2P通道传输频道的时候，用来传输频道的P2P通道也需要占用频道……
每种P2P通道可以传输对应种类的频道、物品、流体、红石信号、能量，甚至可以传输光源！
你只能合成普通的P2P通道，然后你需要手持物品右击来限制它传输的东西。（查询REI以获取每种类型的物品）。
现在你弄好了P2P通道，你还需要输入和输出。每种通道只能有一个输入，可以有多个输出，传输的物品则会平均分配。
要设置绑定，你需要手持内存卡潜行右击输入的P2P通道，然后拿着同一张内存卡右击其他的通道进行绑定。你可以设置任意多个输出通道。
都什么年代了还在用传统传送带？
高玩才知道的物品传输法
Each bus doesn't do a lot that exceeds the brainpower of a normal individual, the Import Bus imports from the adjacent inventory, eating a channel, and inputting everything into the network.
Export Busses do the exact reverse, except the channel of course.

Storage Busses are a bit cooler, first, they treat any inventory connected as if it was part of the ME network, like the contents of a Vault. Thus, items can be put in or extracted by busses. On the left, you can set priorities, the lower, the most important it finds to first fill up this, and then the rest.

The Import and Export Busses can be upgraded with the Acceleration (wonder what it does), Redstone, and Capacity cards, with Capacity increasing the filtering capacity by four, with a cap on two installed at once.
高速公路通地狱
The Level Emitter is your Stockpile Switch; it emits or stops emitting a Redstone signal once the configured item reaches a certain threshold, which can, of course be chosen.
The Redstone Card enables Redstone control, allowing you to turn off the Export Bus once less than 4 stacks of iron remain in the network.
Stuff can be incomplete, missing, or wrong, always refer to the Wiki to stay with the crowd.
万物皆不完美
本章内容只是简单介绍！
The &eFormation Plane&r acts like a &nStorage Bus&r.
When an item is imported into the ME Network, ME Formation Plane will try to place that block or drop that item.
Tip: To "filter" the Annihilation Plane, position it so that it can only accept the desired item.
The &eAnnihilation Plane&r works like an &nImport Bus&r.
It will &ninstantly&r break blocks in front of itself and import them into the ME Network.
The Annihilation Plane supports enchants:
- Fortune, Silk Touch - works the same as on the pickaxe
- Efficiency - decreases power usage upon breaking the block
The absolute power... for your cobblestone generators!
The power of Creation and Destruction
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests4: 在月球的各种结构以及陨石中可以找到这种基础的压印模板。
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests5: 将赛特斯石英粉加热到临界温度可以获得未处理的硅。
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests6: 在处理器制作中要用到的基础电路板材。
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests8: AE2的陨石现在无法从陨石结构中获得了。
It now generates in large, rare pockets under the Moon's surface. Take note if you see any!
&eAll uses have been merged with Ad Astra Sky Stone!&r
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.quests9: 要自动化赛特斯石英粉，你需要用沙子与其合成种子，并将种子扔进水里清洗。当种子长成纯净的水晶时，就可以再将它们磨成粉末了。
ftbquests.chapter.astral_storage.title: 第3.5章 星辰存储
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests0.desc: But wait, alloying hasn't been invented yet!
You can create &6Bronze&r by smithing Copper together with Tin.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests1.desc: &6Cogwheels&r and &6Shafts&r take rotational input - such as from a Hand Crank or a Water Wheel - and transfer the power around.
&6Large Cogwheels&r in particular can be used to change the axis of rotation, or speed up/slow down the rotation speed when used in combination with small Cogwheels.
Use the Ponder feature to learn more!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests10.des: Casing used in Train creation, and some other miscellaneous recipes. Once again, applies the same as other casings, this time using Sturdy Sheet and an Andesite Casing as a base.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests11.des: Assemble a Train to earn this advancement.
Trains are pretty advanced compared to the rest of this chapter. It's highly recommended that you probe around with the Ponder feature!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests12.des: 不想摆弄你那个木质曲柄了？
如果&6水车&r其中一面上有水流过，就会产生应力。
给水车上加更多的水&6不会&r提高应力输出，或者转速。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests13.des: 要制造你的第一个&6安山机壳&r的话：
首先，把木头用斧头剥皮。
其次，拿着安山合金右键剥皮原木。
日后你可以自动化这个过程。
安山机壳是很多机械动力机器的核心组件。
你还可以用它美化你的齿轮和传动轴，还有皮带！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests15.des: &6搅拌机&r是用来搅拌物品的，流体固体都行。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests16.sub: 也和泰拉瑞亚没有半毛钱关系
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests17.des: &6计算机&r可以执行&6Lua&r代码，用处多多。
哦，别担心……计算机不是通关这个包的必需品。
Computers can attach peripherals and network using Modems.
Wired Modems can connect to Chests, Tanks and Batteries and network Computers, while Wireless Modems can only network different Computers.
- 自动化物品传输与分类
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests17.sub: if not ok then return end
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests18.des: &6海龟&r是可移动的基础计算机。
还有很多很多……自己探索喽。
要让海龟动起来的话，需要燃料。
给海龟的燃料槽位丢点煤炭，然后在计算机上执行turtle.refuel()。
海龟还可以加点外设，让它们可以干别的事，比如：
- 和别的海龟/计算机进行通讯
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests19.des: 这套护甲的基础保护比铁护甲高多了，在强大攻击时可以提供超强保护能力，而且耐久非常高。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests2.desc: &6Mechanical Presses&r can press items underneath them.
In all cases, Mechanical Press will process items.
&e⚠&r Putting a solid block between a Depot/Belt and Mechanical Press will prevent it from processing items!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests20.des: 用这套铁盔甲武装自己！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests21.des: 你可以用&6手摇曲柄&r来手动驱动机械动力的机器。
但这特别累人，你的饥饿度会马上消耗完的！
对于测试盾构机很有用。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests22.des: &6Millstones&r are used to, well, mill stuff.
Simply throw anything on top or supply items by automation and Millstone will mill the items.
Items can be extracted either via right-clicking the Millstone or by automation.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests23.des: With the &6Nether not existing&r, alternative sources such as this are essential!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests23.sub: With a solid source of Diorite, you can produce a lot of Quartz.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests24.des: The path to Trains requires Obsidian Dust. Unforunately, you won't be able to collect Obsidian until you get a Drill, so you might have to come back to this later.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests25.des: Use the Mixer to create Grout, which is used in Tinkers'-related blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests26.des: Craft some &6Andesite Compound&r and smelt in in a Furnace.
Looks expensive? Don't worry - you'll soon be able to create Andesite Alloy 3 times cheaper!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests26.tit: 哎哟这玩意黏在我手上了
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests27.des: Find ways to turn this into Clay!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests27.sub: Milling Gravel and Sandstone will break down into Sand.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests28.des: Used in Wire and Rod production, the Rolling Mill works just like the Millstone!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests29.des: - Upgrade your Hephaestus gear - just put the tool and a Diamond in a Tinker Station. The tool can now mine like a Diamond tool, and also will mine faster and will have more durability.
- Create an Enchanting Table to upgrade your vanilla-style gear.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests3.desc: &6Iron Sheets&r are used to create a wide variety of Create machinery.
Try making a Mixer to perform your first Mixing recipe!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests30.des: 为你的基地增添一抹星际感。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests31.des: &6Mechanical Saws&r can cut whole trees in one swoop!
If the Mechanical Saw destroys all the bottommost logs of the tree, it will destroy all logs and leaves of the tree above!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests33.des: Fans can blow you around, no surprise.
But they are far more useful. New processing methods open up when Fans are placed in front of Lava, Water, and Campfires.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests34.des: When air pushed/pulled by a Mechanical Fan passes through certain blocks, the air current gains special properties.
This stream of air can smelt things smeltable in a Furnace or a Blast Furnace.
If an item isn't smeltable, it will be &nincinerated&r instead.
BEWARE: The air is too hot for cooking food, the food will be &nincinerated&r too!
> &6Bulk Smoking&r - when air passes through Fire or a Campfire.
This stream of air can cook food, just like Smoker or a Campfire does.
This can be used for &6Bulk Processing&r items dropped on the ground, on Depots or on Belts.
> &6Bulk Washing&r - when air passes through Water.
Washing Raw Ores will yield you Nuggets and sometimes a byproduct.
You can also use washing for specific stuff that normally requires Water, like converting Concrete Powder into Concrete, or Flour into Dough.
> &6Bulk Blasting&r - when air passes through Lava.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests35.des: Are you annoyed at Gearboxes reversing rotation? And Belts aren't very bendable?
Placing them next to each other causes them to spin in the same direction.
Additionally, Encased Chain Drives can change axis.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests36.des: &6Gearboxes&r allow you to easily and compactly make turns in your rotational network.
They may be expensive, but they are extremely convenient.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests37.des: Is your farm spilling items or needlessly using SU?
&6Clutches&r come in clutch. Powering Clutches with Redstone will stop rotation.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests38.des: To glue stuff together, Right-Click a block and move the cursor around. Use Ponder for more information.
Gluing things together is a little finnicky especially when starting out, you might need to take a few tries to get things right.
You'll also need glue for things in later chapters.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests38.sub: You'll need this for creating the Train cars themselves.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests39.des: The &6Wrench&r allows you to rotate and configure Create blocks.
可以立刻拆下机械动力和与红石有关的方块，被拆下的方块会直接进入你的物品栏。
可以调整某些方块（比如轴向底盘）
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests39.sub: 这东西你要用一辈子的
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests39.tit: 特别尤其极度格外异常超级十分甚至九分重要
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests4.desc: &6Chutes&r can drop items from the inventory above to inventory below.
They can be also made diagonal to transfer items diagonally down.
Since they pull items 16 at a time instead of just 1 at a time, definitely invest in some Chutes.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests4.titl: 就像漏斗，但是超级垂直
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests40.des: 机械动力的世界充满了机器、工业和自动化，同时也是这个整合包的基本主题之一。
接下来每一个章节都会引入更多更复杂的配方和材料，你可以挑战建造更加复杂的自动化流水线。
而最后你获得的奖励便是探索深邃宇宙的机会。
这一章任务会为你介绍机械动力的基础知识，还有一些可用的新方块。
因为机械动力的内容之多、范围之广，这个任务书没有办法面面俱到地为你介绍模组的内容。
好消息是，你可以把鼠标悬停在机械动力的方块上——在物品栏里或者REI界面里均可——然后按住W键进行思索，学习这个方块或物品的详细工作原理。
如果你还觉得不够，可以上网搜索相关视频——机械动力的教程资料多到你无法想象！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests41.sub: 这个对列车来说很重要
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests42.des: 列车站是建造列车必不可少的部分。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests43.des: Here is some extra stuff if you want to complicate things even more.
What they do and how they work is outside the scope of this guide, but feel free to take advantage of the Ponder mechanic!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests44.des: 流动岩浆在基岩上碰到水会生成各种石头，你可能以前玩整合包的时候就用过这个方案了！
主要生成的是&6石头&r，还有概率生成&6闪长岩、安山岩和花岗岩&r。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests44.sub: 实在不想找安山岩的备用方案
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests45.des: 篮子可以像普通箱子和桶一样装27组物品，而且可以捡起它面前一个方块的掉落物。
篮子可以朝六个方向放置。
你的刷圆石机肯定会很喜欢这个的！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests45.sub: 装不下圆石了？篮子就能解决这个问题！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests46.des: 在基地周围的铁道放进和出的列车信号机，可以让自动化列车工作。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests46.sub: 你搞到信号机就可以发信号！ok兄弟们信号发起来！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests47.des: Stonecut regular Tracks to get their variants!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests48.des: You can press &6Coral varieties&r into Prismarine.
Useful is automating Veridium (for Copper) later on, it would be wise to consider learning the recipe chains in REI!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests49.des: &6Enchanting Tables&r allow you to randomly enhance your tools and armor using Experience and Lapis Lazuli.
Make sure to prepare a Grindstone (for scrapping terrible enchantments) and an Anvil (for combining enchanted items) too.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests5.desc: 机械动力最有代表性的制作原料。我建议你尽快完成安山合金的自动化生产线。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests50.des: Iron tools are more durable than Copper tools.
They won't let you mine Diamonds, however.
You'll need to resort to some Create-ive ideas to get those sweet Diamonds from the ore.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests52.des: These can be discovered through specific structures in the Overworld...
Keep an eye out for any &eruined satellite dishes,&r they just might hold something important.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests52.sub: Discover a lost receiver to show this questline.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests53.des: Stockpile Switches can be set to broadcast a Redstone signal when an inventory has reached a certain threshold, and will turn off once it drops below a threshold.

This is handy for dumping inventories when clogged up. This also helps manage fine control of what resources are being made. You don't really need any more than four stacks of Andesite Casing at a time, yeah? Use this, and now any extra Andesite Casings produced can continue to be transformed into Copper and Brass Casings.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests54.des: The Smart Observer can broadcast a Redstone signal whenever an inventory has a matching item.
Not too useful if you've managed your factories well enough, you should already know what's in an inventory. That being said, put it your inventory Crafting Table and...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests6.desc: Slice a Bronze Ingot into two &6Sheets &rusing a Stonecutter.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests7.desc: Power the Drill, and it will start drilling the block in from of itself.
Since Drills don't care about mining levels, you can mine practically anything with them.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests7.subt: 你永远可以相信动力钻头
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests8.desc: &6坚固板&r是用来造和火车相关的东西的。
- Replacement for Mechanical Pistons for crop/tree farms
Usually Trains come later in the progression, but we are generous.
火车有且不限以下用途：
- 传输自己：火车无供能时，自己开的速度最大可达&621米/秒&r
有供能时，手动开火车最高速度可达&630米/秒&r。
- 在相距甚远的两地运输怪物
- 在相距甚远的两地运输物品
Trains can be also driven automatically with a Train Schedule - Trains drive 33%% faster when doing so and can also drive through unloaded chunks.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quests9.desc: Trains drive on &6Tracks&r, so you'll need some in order for your Train to move.
Tracks can be placed straight, diagonally, and also can make smooth turns.
If you want even more Tracks, there will be a cheaper recipe later on.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.title: 1) The Andesite World
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_25_the_automat: Bone Meal is used to speed up the growth of crops.

This chapter is special. The quests listed aren't here to present you with progression challenges, but to give you a visualization of what it takes to automate specific resources, and how resources overlap. It is a giant flowchart.
Important: just because a resource is in here, DOES NOT MEAN YOU NEED TO AUTOMATE IT. Again, this page is a visualization tool, not a guidebook.
我明白了
这章是什么？
任意种类黏液球
选择你的黏液球
下列流程图简单易读！成品指向原材料。
提示：某些任务在你解锁靠后的任务后才会解锁，即便你不打算自动化某物品，也可以完成这些任务来保证自己没错过某些资源。

Due to space constraints, we can't show every connection. Any quests marked ("from elsewhere") means the steps to automate the resource are described somewhere else in the flowchart. Also, the flowchart skips some steps that can be assumed easily, such as packing nuggets, melting metals, etc.
我明白了
如何阅读本章的流程图
The information may feel overwhelming at first.
Opting to show you as much info as possible to know in advance what recipes may become available in the near future should help you begin to plan out your automation chains.
我明白了
祝好运！
红石不仅可以用来合成原始的红石电路，也可用于合成一些基础的电子电路和电路工具。
Tesla Coil charge Synthetic Redstone Crystals.
Farm Kelp.
Dried Kelp is used for crafting Tunnels, Funnels, and Belts, which are used a lot in item transportation during automation.
It can also be used as a fuel source when crafted into blocks.
Bulk smoke Kelp.
The Automation Matrix
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests0.desc: You probably want to store your molten metal somewhere.
&6Fluid Tanks&r store 10 buckets of liquid per Tank.
储罐可以按1x1，2x2或者3x3的形式搭建，直接向上加储罐也可以加大容量。
你没法手动给储罐加流体，储罐只接受自动化形式的流体输入，比如管道。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests0.subt: Store your liquids in a stylish way!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests1.desc: The molten metal will be also used later for &6alloys&r. More on that later.
Place a &6Melter&r on top of a &6Heater&r.
You can now melt metals. Try inserting some Raw Iron into the Melter!
Melting raw ores in the Melter will provide you with 4 ingots of metal per 3 raw ore!
You can extract liquids from the Melter using &6Create pipes&r or &6Hephaestus Faucets&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests10.des: 该放演职员表咯（译者注：这刚哪到哪啊，乐）
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests11.des: - 列车可以通过月球传送门。
- 任务奖励可以让你搭建一个四角都有的月球传送门，不用浪费你的月岩和闪光物！
你需要搭建一个&9月球&r传送门！
把&6闪光石&r搭成一个普通传送门的样子。
然后用&6星辰导管&r点燃传送门！
Make sure to have a Space Suit equipped!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests13.des: No power is needed to this machine to load Oxygen into your Space Suit!
Also, be aware that this pack changes many recipes - you can't create &7Oxygen&r from &7Water&r here, use an &6Electrolyzer&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests13.sub: Loads Oxygen into your Space Suit!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests14.des: Don't confuse this with a Tech Reborn Electrolyzer!
Ponder the Electrolyzer to learn how to build it.
If the multiblock is done correctly, the Electrolyser will start producing Oxygen.
Pump Oxygen from the Electrolyzer - you don't need filters as Oxygen is the only liquid that can be extracted.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests14.sub: 星辰整合包自定义多方块结构！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests15.des: &6Electron Tubes&r are used in advanced Create technology.
So far, there's not much use for them, but when you get access to Brass, they will become important.

Tip: To polish Rose Quartz manually, hold &6Sand Paper&r in one hand, &6Rose Quartz&r in other, and hold Right-Click. To polish Rose Quartz automatically, you can use a Deployer! Note that Sand Paper breaks after 8 uses.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests16.des: &6Redstone Chips&r are circuits specialized for radio equipment - like radios from Phonos.
They will be used for the next thing required to go to the Moon.
Make sure to craft more than one of these - you will need multiple!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests16.sub: This will be terrible for the Industrial Revolution.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests17.des: &6Rose Gold&r is an alloy of &6Molten Copper&r and &6Molten Gold&r.
The recipe you are performing is mixing &6molten metals&r, not &6ingots&r!
By mixing them in the Basin, of course!
Pump &6Molten Gold&r and &6Molten Copper&r into the Basin.
Don't worry - Basins only accept up to 1 bucket of each fluid.
The resulting &6Rose Gold&r can be either pumped out with an aid of a &6Smart Fluid Pipe&r, or by placing another &6Basin&r or an &6Item Drain&r diagonally downwards relative to the basin.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests17.sub: What a nice alloy, I hope I dont need to make loads of it...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests19.des: &6Shimmer&r can be found in underground &6Shimmer Lakes&r, which can be found with a use of a Structure Compass.
Alternatively, Shimmer can be produced by mixing Amethyst Dust and Glow Ink Sacs together.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests2.desc: Smelt some &6Grout&r using a Furnace or by Bulk Blasting.
Seared Bricks are an integral component for various Melter-related things!
As a reward, you will get a book that explains many things about the Melter usage.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests20.des: &6Copper Casings&r are largely used for fluid machines, much like Andesite Casings used for kinetic machines.
Copper Casings can also cover pipes, locking their connections with neighboring blocks - check out the Ponder for more info.
When making the next tier of casings, you'll be needing a lot of the previous tiered stuff too.
As such, automation is recommended to make the production easier.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests21.des: You can produce Andesite Alloy with &6triple&r efficiency using a Mechanical Mixer.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests22.des: The &6Tinker's Anvil&r allows you to assemble tools, just like the Tinker Station.
However, unlike Tinker Station, it can produce &6broad tools&r too, such as Broad Axes, Sledge Hammers, or Excavators.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests23.sub: Bronze is a great material for your Hephaestus tools!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests24.des: &9Luck&r works like Fortune and Looting combined!
It's an &6ability&r, so it uses a special Ability slot to apply.
Further levels of this modifier don't require any modifier slots.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests27.des: Pumping this and shipping it off to your base might be wise, Shimmer is a valuable resource to control.
&7If you choose to use the Explorer's Compass, remember that Shimmer Lakes form at around Y=-24!&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests27.sub: Spread across the Overworld and Moon, you might uncover a buried meteor filled with Shimmer...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests29.des: By mixing Copper and Tin Ingots in a Basin using a Mechanical Mixer, you can produce Bronze with double efficiency!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests3.desc: Don't forget about Ponder - it will explain most of the Fluid Pipe mechanics.
流体管道一次只能传递一个流体，如果两个流体在一个管道中相遇，管道就会被破坏掉。
However, simply conntecting two Tanks with a Pipe won't work.
You must use a &6Mechanical Pump&r to force the flow.
Mechanical Pumps can push and pull liquids &625&r blocks from the pump.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests30.des: You can use &6Coin Casts&r to cast &nSmall Cogwheels&r.
You can use &6Gear Casts&r to cast &nLarge Cogwheels.
This method is more expensive in Bronze, but you won't use any Andesite Alloy!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests30.sub: You can cast cogwheels out of Molten Bronze!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests31.des: For the new inventions, a new resource will be needed - &6Sap&r.
First, find some Rubber Trees - they are common in Plains or in Forests.
Then, use a &6Treetap&r on a Log that has Sap on it to extract it.
You can also mill Rubber Logs for Sap.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests32.des: &6Rubber&r is used for a lot of important things.
You'll want to farm some Sap.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests32.sub: Mix up some Sap in a Mixer and get this lovely substance!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests32.tit: 橡胶：本世代的安山合金
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests33.des: &6Mechanical Belts&r can move items on them around.
Items dropped onto the Belt will be placed on it.
Items on the Belt can be bulk-processed, although sometimes the automation might get stuck - Use a &6Depot&r at the end of the Belt line to prevent items from being stuck.
Mechanical Belts can also insert items to Chutes, Millstones, or aforementioned Depots, placed one block behind the end of the belt.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests34.des: &6Sturdy Chests&r hold 54 stacks of items - 9 more than Copper Chests!
That &6Sturdy Chest&r you earned from the Traveler's Armor quest in Chapter 0.5 doesn't count.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests35.des: The &6Deployer&r is very special - it acts as a player Right-Clicking or Left-Clicking.
Deployers always interact with things 2 blocks ahead of itself. It can place blocks, feed animals, use a Bucket... It can do a lot!
Deployers can also be used in a new type of recipe - deploying items onto other items on a Depot or a Belt.
To craft them, you will need Polished Rose Quartz. Hold &6Sand Paper&r in one hand, &6Rose Quartz&r in the other, and hold Right-Click.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests36.des: &6Andesite Funnels&r can extract items from the inventory, 1 item at a time.
They can either place items on the Belt or Depot, or drop items in-world if there are neither.
Very useful to kickstart the belt spaghetti.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests37.des: - Contents of Chutes, Tunnels, or Tanks
- Exact readouts from Speedometer and Stressometer
- SU generation rates for stress generators and boilers
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests37.sub: 做一副护目镜吧，很有用的！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests38.des: Mechanical Bearings can attach to a structure on top.
When activated, the resulting contraption will start spinning, and all actors (Mechanical Saws, Drills, Deployers, etc.) will activate.
Blocks destroyed by actors such as Mechanical Saws and Drills will be inserted into a Chest, Barrel, Vault or a Toolbox on a contraption, if present.
To extract items from the contraption, use &6Portable Storage Interfaces&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests39.des: They are smart enough to only harvest fully-grown tools - additionally crops collected by Mechanical Harvester will be automatically replanted!
&6Kelp&r will be used a lot in the future - make sure to make a large farm!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests39.sub: 人力劳动农耕的时代结束了
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests4.desc: 这一章的任务看着都头大，是不是？
工业化的优点就在于你可以自己决定自己需要什么资源，运用手头的工具和顽强的意志完成自动化生产。
条条大路通罗马，成功不止一种方法，你自行解决问题的能力就是最好的向导。
跨越工业革命这道坎之后，月球的大门就将为你敞开，你可以尽情探索月球的奥秘。
在月球，你可以找到全新的资源，为你的自动化工厂提升效率、更新换代。
另外，你在本章中所建立的所有自动化产线，直到你打通这个整合包之前，都会马不停蹄地为你提供基础物资。
安山世界给了你缓冲的时间，从这章开始，你能做的事越来越多，生产资源的流程越来越繁琐，工业化也会越来越复杂。
所有内容都以你之前所学的内容为基础，所以提高自己的工业技术才是硬道理。
在这章中你会发现，基础资源的管理以及自动化某些资源变得越来越麻烦。
你需要开始着手半自动或者全自动生产基础资源，临到需要的时候再手搓资源并不利于可持续化发展。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests40.des: Having wet &6Kelp&r doesn't help you much.
Before Kelp goes to the final destination, it'd be best if you &6Bulk Smoke&r it on the way.
(Dried Kelp is a food item! Bulk Blasting it will burn it!)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests41.des: If you put them on a moving contraption, they should do exactly what you'd expect.
That being said, one caveat of automatic farming is that trees need to be replanted.
- Put them above the Saws or on the opposite side of the arm
- Equip them with Saplings. Make sure that Deployers are facing down.
Trees that are cut down will provide you with more Saplings.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests41.sub: Remember the Mechanical Saw from the last chapter?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests42.des: Tree farms produce &6Logs&r, &6Sticks&r and &6Saplings&r - you probably won't want to keep all of them at once, or else your farm will start spilling items!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests42.sub: 枯燥的砍树工作已经成为历史
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests43.des: Washing Red Sand gives you 33%% chance of getting &6Zinc Nuggets&r and 12%% chance of getting Dead Bushes.
Your only two options for automating Red Sand at this point are milling Terracotta blocks or Granite, both of which are quite slow to produce.
You can go back to this automation later, or wash Red Sand obtained from digging from Badlands.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests43.sub: I want minerals for a healthy factory lifestyle.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests44.des: Washing Gravel gives 25%% chance of getting &6Flint&r and 12%% chance of getting &6Iron Nuggets&r.
If you have lots of spare &6Tuff&r, you can Mill it to get 1 &6Iron Nugget&r.
You can automate Gravel by milling Cobblestone.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests44.sub: You may have built this dozens of times already.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests45.des: Sand can be washed for 25%% chance of getting &6Clay&r.
There's a 25%% chance of getting Gravel from milling Sand. Not too efficient, but it will do.
Alternatively, you can produce Dripstone blocks and mill them into Clay.
The setup requires either a big vanilla farm or Calcite automation, so get your Moss farm prepared!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests46.des: If you have Belts going through walls, or if you don't want to accidentally drop an item onto the Belt from above, &6Andesite Tunnels&r can cover them.
If there's a Belt perpendicular to the main Belt, and the Andesite Tunnel is placed on a junction, the Andesite Tunnel will split one item from the stack on the Belt.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests47.des: The true power of Create isn't in the new crafting techniques it provides, but the ability to automate resources.
You don't need to complete them immediately - just consider starting sometime down the line.
By the way - there may have been some of these automation quests in Chapter 1!
- Full automation, where a specific resource will be made until the end of time without any need for the player to touch a system
- Semi-automation, where you only need to periodically restock starting resources or fuel
This pack won't always tell you when to automate and what can be automated. That'll be up to you to decide.
That being said, we'll occasionally make diamond-shaped automation quests, to either let you know that a new automation opportunity exists, or because it's a really strong idea.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests48.des: 还记得第一章的铁轨配方么？
&6机械手&r可以将你的铁轨造价&6减少三倍&r！
石台阶和铁粒都很容易自动化，在REI里头找配方！
要完成这个任务，你需要用动力辊压机辊压出&61000个列车轨道&r。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests49.des: 盾构机复杂到你肯定想骂街，我非常，非常非常非常建议你在B站上看教程学学。
最后，你的盾构机还需要一个长一点的脖子。脖子的前部需要放一个低一格的机械手来放置铁轨，后部需要放一个动力犁来回收铁轨。
在背部放个机械犁把铁轨捡起来，再传输到前面搭好。
如果你用动力矿车来造盾构机矿车的话，路上掉落的煤炭会直接供给矿车燃烧用。
只需要挖一小会就可以获得大量矿物，不过挖隧道的过程中你需要手动放置光源，还得想个办法对付从黑暗中刷出来的怪物。
虽然我推荐你去看教程，不过我还是给你点建议吧。
任意种类矿车穿过红石信号充能的矿车装配站时，就会变成装配过的矿车。
手持扳手右击可以把整个装配过的矿车收到物品栏。
装配过的矿车开到未充能的矿车装配站就会变回方块形态。
盾构机矿车结构包含一面动力钻头组成的墙和一面机械手组成的墙（机械手用于放置圆石或深板岩圆石），墙的最外圈要保证机械手在动力钻头前面。这样设计的盾构机结构可以防止流动的液体把机器搞坏。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests5.desc: &6注液器&r可以把液体注入物品中，制造出新的物品。
They can also interact with some blocks, like Hephaestus Basins and Casting Tables.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests50.des: &6Cart Assemblers&r allow you to create Minecart Contraptions - special contraptions that can drive on Rails and can be picked up with a Wrench.
矿车装配机对于线性工作非常适合，就比如&6挖隧道&r。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests51.des: Certain automation processes use animated &6Contraptions&r - for example tree and crop farms.
强力胶对于把不同方块组合为动力结构来说，很有用。
别把你的基地也黏在动力结构上了！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests52.des: 完成下方的任意一个目标来完成该任务。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests52.sub: 信我，自动化三种燃料中的一种，以后就不愁燃料了。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests53.des: 首先在浇筑桌上放一个想做铸模的东西，比如一个斧子头。
然后把大约1个锭的熔融金倒进浇筑桌，
之后物品会被消耗掉，而金质铸模就做好了！你可以用它制造金属部件了！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests53.sub: 沙子铸模也挺好，但是用完就没了。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests55.sub: 嗯……这个是……？这到底是什么玩楞？！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests56.des: &6风车&r可以以1至16的rpm工作，具体rpm取决于风帆数量。
的确需要非常多的变速齿轮，但产生的应力非常多。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests57.des: &6Item Vaults&r can store 20 stacks of items per block.
物品保险库可以组合为1x1x3,2x2x6和3x3x9的多方块结构，随着结构体积变大，总储存空间也会变大——3x3x9的保险库可以储存1620组物品！
物品保险库只能用自动化方式进行物品交互，意味着你得用漏斗、溜槽、花岗岩/黄铜漏斗之类的方式才能输入/提取物品。
黄铜漏斗或智能溜槽后期会很有用。
&eWarning&r: Big slotted inventories do not pair well with filtered Brass Funnels/Smart Chutes, if it comes for perfomance.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests58.des: Place pointed Dripstone underneath a block, and then put a Lava source block above the block. Then, 1-10 blocks below the Dripstone, place a Cauldron.
The Lava from the Cauldron can then be pumped out into a Fluid Tank, giving you a buffer of Lava. A couple recipes involve spouting Lava on materials, so it's handy to have this set up.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests58.sub: 从地下一桶一桶搬东西很烦不是吗？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests59.des: 你可以用&6智能流体管道&r过滤通过流体。
Hephaestus buckets don't render, but they still work as filters.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests6.desc: &6Item Drains&r have the ability to drain liquid from liquid-containing items, such as buckets and bottles.
&6Hose Pulleys&r can fill or drain a body of liquid, up to the certain threshold.
&6Portable Fluid Interfaces&r operate much like Portable Storage Interfaces, but they interact with fluids and Tanks on the Contraption instead.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests60.des: &6Display Boards&r can show text on a big board.
You can edit their text by clicking on the line with a named Name Tag.
Make sure that the Display Boards' cogs spin with sufficient speed!
&6Display Links&r can take data from various vanilla or Create blocks and show them on the Display Board.
用它做个列车时刻表，或者应力监控器！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests60.sub: 只是看着你的工厂一步步生产资源，都会让你感到心满意足
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests61.des: 做一个有128叶片方块的风车。
你为了这个任务会花费数以千计的羊毛，所以任务奖励我会给你一组羊毛。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests62.des: 还记得第1章里，你是怎么用强力胶组装列车的吗？是不是和矿车结构和动力轴承旋转结构有点像？
其实，列车也是类似的移动结构。
这意味着你可以在列车上安装动力锯、动力钻、收割机、移动存储接口等方块，并且他们也会正常工作。
也就是说，你可以建造一个靠列车和设定好的时刻表工作的农场。
如果你的资源多得用不完的话，可以尝试一下！
你甚至可以做一个列车盾构机，不过这种盾构机并不会比矿车盾构机简单多少。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests62.sub: 列车上的动力锯……会有用吗？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests63.des: 要把你的混合物变成锭的话，需要一个&6锭铸模&r。
或者你可以直接在&6铸造盆&r浇筑一个方块出来。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests64.des: 你可以把橡胶木粉碎，会产出&6树液&r。树液在搅拌机里可以做出&6橡胶&r。
准备做个自动化橡胶树树场吧，它可以产出最基础的物资！
还有，你可以用机械手拿着木龙头，对着橡胶树自动提取树液。
效率不太高，但是环境友好！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests65.des: 你能做的自动化可能比你想得到的要多。这里给你提供一些自动化的思路，现在就做或者之后再做都行：
- 你可以自动化食物来源
- 你最喜欢的装饰方块（例如石砖）
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests65.sub: 你只不过需要点§5绝§d对§4天§c马§e行§a空§b的§3想§9象§1能§5力§r罢了。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests66.des: Walking on &6Andesite Pavement&r will grant you a &6Speed I&r effect.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests67.des: Ye filthy landlubbers can't even walk 10 seconds on the ocean floor without spluttering for air.
&6Copper Backtank&rs store compressed air, used by Diving Helmets and some pneumatic tools.
Speaking of the &6Diving Helmet&r - it allows you to breathe underwater and nullifies the mining penalty underwater if the Copper Backtank you wear has air inside.
&6Diving Boots&r allow you to walk and jump underwater instead of swimming. Wearing them, you will no longer be moved by Mechanical Belts.
These three will be useful for creation of a special suit designed to withstand the vacuum of space...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests68.des: Pieces of the Moon remain all over the Overworld. You can stumble upon them in small meteors, in loot chests, on sky islands, or find a large quantity of it near a &6Shimmer Lake&r.
Collect at least &610 Moon Stone&r to make enough Shimmering Stone for a portal.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests69.des: Obtain &6Scorched Basin and Table&r by blasting their Seared counterparts in a Blast Furnace or using Bulk Blasting.
Scorched Basins and Tables only accept liquids when there's a cast!
For example: The Scorched Basin won't accept Molten Clay, when there's no Stone or Andesite in the Basin.
If you for some reason want to cast recipes that don't require a cast, you can use &6Gold Platforms&r and &6Gold Bars&r as an "empty cast".
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests7.desc: Put a &6Faucet&r on the side or below the Melter or any other Tank.
Put a Casting Basin, Table or a Tank below the Faucet to transfer the liquid to them.
Now, you can right-click the Faucet to start pouring liquids!
You can power the Faucet with Redstone in order to cast continuously!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests70.des: The Smeltery has been &ndisabled&r in this pack.
In this pack, alloying is done through Create's Mechanical Mixers.
Later on, you will get access to the Foundry, completely skipping the Smeltery.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests71.des: 在含水楼梯边上倒岩浆，就会生成黑曜石。
2：在粉末上灌注岩浆，然后再压2次，把上述步骤重复五次，这样坚固板就做好了。
用动力钻头挖黑曜石，如果转速是256RPM的话其实耗时没多久。
然后把黑曜石磨成黑曜石粉，被研磨的黑曜石有概率返还。
然后，有两步处理方式要走：
1：用动力辊压机压黑曜石粉10次，这样坚固板的完成进度就到了60%。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests71.sub: Exploit liquid manipulation to automate Sturdy Sheets.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests72.des: &6丝触&r和原版精准采集差不多。
如果把它附到剑上，那么剑就可以当剪刀用。
如果把它附到园艺镰上，那么它就可以采集史莱姆藤蔓，原版精准采集做不到！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests73.des: &c急迫&r这个增强不言而喻了吧，它可以加快工具采集速度。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests73.sub: 效率，但是这是匠魂版的
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests74.des: Automatable warm ocean no matter where you are at!
&b温馨提示：在REI里头对着珊瑚按U，这样可以查阅所有合成表！
Whilst not a priority right now, do take the time to see the possibilites of &6Crushing&r these blocks later...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests75.des: 随机器合成附赠完整原理图！思索这个方块还有更多信息！
还可以用别的抛光石头，比如抛光月岩来生产不同星球的石头，&6千万别忘了！&r
&7中层：中间放岩浆，周边放原版玻璃。&r
&7底层：3x3抛光安山岩，把主方块放在任意面的中心。&r
&6石头催生仓&r建造完毕后，会缓慢生产安山岩。这是个动力钻头+刷石机的高效升级版，安山岩不仅可以研磨为圆石，而且比设计刷石机轻松多了，最重要的是它帮你把产物收集也做好了！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests75.sub: 这是个3x3的多方块结构，可以基于星球产生方块！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests76.des: Create Orestones have been changed to be &6fully automatable&r.
The recipes each require a liquid, a block (or two!) and a dye.
Merging these production lines to end in an orestone farm can fund your factories for the foreseeable future.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests76.sub: Huge ore returns with side products galore!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests8.desc: &6Casting Basins and Tables&r allow you to shape molten metal into various forms: blocks, ingots, tool parts - you name it!
&6Casts&r are required to craft ingots, nuggets and tool parts.
&6Sand Casts&r can be swiftly created, however they only last for 1 use.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests9.desc: &6探险家指南针&r可以带你去往很多种不同结构！
我不建议你去&7要塞&r，因为里头的下界传送门没用。
你还可以用探险家指南针找到&6闪光溶液湖&r，或许不久之后就会派上用场……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quests9.subt: 指南针，带我去个结构看看！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.title: 2) Getting Industrial
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests0.desc: Pipelines spawn with dangerous Wither Skeletons and guaranteed Blaze Spawners. With an empty Blaze Burner, you'll be able to Right-Click Blazes and scoop them up.

Blaze Burners let you do heated (and later on, super-heated) recipes, where you can light a fire under a Basin for a Mixer or Press to operate on. A lot of recipes can only be made this way. It's the reason you really should have fuel automated.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests0.subt: Obtain a Blaze from a lost Pipeline on the Moon!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests1.desc: 多多生产黄铜，你会需要用它制作许多独特的工具。尽管你已经有了自动化，但是你也许还要建造一个采石场或者一台盾构机，快速获取这种材料。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests10.des: 不过你暂时还不能编程！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests100.de: 电动马达相当于把交流发电机反过来：输入的是电能，输出的是旋转能。当然这个过程是有能量损耗的，利用率大约只有75%%。不过，导电线缆可以解决动力传动过程中复杂的齿轮变速和传动杆转向问题。并且，在之后的科技发展中，你还可以制作更强大的发电机器，也许可以完全代替传统的动能机械。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests100.su: 电能可以反向转化为旋转动力
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests100.ti: 你的第三种动力源！也有可能是第四种！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests101.de: Diamond-grit Sand Paper is far more efficient than regular Sand Paper. Although you will have to say goodbye to one of your Diamonds to get Diamond Dust, it's worth not having to replace your Sand Paper every five seconds.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests101.su: 除了这个，钻石还有什么别的用吗？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests102.de: 火药有个特殊的生产方法：在磨粉机中粉碎干海带。尽管我们没想让你制作很多TNT，但是也许火药可以用来制作某种蓝色的岩石……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests103.de: Crushing Limestone will give you Lime, a necessary ingredient for creating Big-Boy Concrete!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests104.de: With a steady source of Blaze Powder and a source of Slime (alternative or otherwise), you now have a path to make Obsidian by cooling Magma Blocks.
Sturdy Sheets become more and more relevant, and are pretty important to the Silver path. You may want to consider automating them.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests104.su: 坚固板存在感越来越高了。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests105.de: The drill acts like an all-purpose pickaxe.
The Jackhammer functions as an efficient pickaxe, except that it's the lowest tier of tool. That is, it can only mine rocks, not ores.
Craft whichever looks the most interesting to you.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests105.ti: 制作一把钻头或凿岩锤
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests107.ti: 给你的橡胶收藏来点电
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests108.de: The Rockcutter acts as a Diamond Pickaxe with Silk Touch.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests109.de: The Accumulator really does act like a giant battery. Its tooltip has more information about how it works.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests11.des: Deepslate, which could previously be milled for Redstone Dust and Copper Nuggets, can now be &6crushed&r for Zinc Nuggets and Coal!
Consider splitting a conveyor into two to automate both processes at once.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests110.de: 这个方便的小盒子可以为电池和电动工具充电，让你的工具真正地拥有无限耐久。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests111.de: Pressing Steel Dust in a heated Basin will coat your Sturdy Armor in a layer of Steel!
It is equivalent to Diamond, and worth making for the aesthetic alone...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests111.su: 希望这个双关你看懂了
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests113.de: Much like generating other celestial stones, Moon Stone can be farmed in the Stone Growth Chamber on the Moon. This wouldn't be helpful on its own, but now you can crush Moon Stone into Moon Sand to be washed.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests113.su: 如果你想知道如何自动化产戴斯的话。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests114.de: By default all sides of Tech Reborn machines are LOCKED. To adjust this you will need to open the block's GUI and click the wrench icon.
This remedies the age old issue default blocks have in which predetermined input/output directions for specific slots limit automation design *heavily*.
You now get to manually configure all individual slots to have a direction input/output based on which sides you wanted to use Funnels to input those items from.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests114.su: 关于单方块机器自动化的简单教程。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests114.ti: 我要怎么从这种机器中输入输出物品？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests116.de: Hint: There is a low chance on most high tier loot chests for any blueprint, however one is guaranteed atop a certain &6Telecommunications Tower&r on the Moon...
