All blueprints can be &6Duplicated&r through compacting in a basin, once you have obtained the first copy.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests116.su: Perhaps a blueprint from a lost civilisation might hold the mechanics to build this thing...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests118.su: Pedal-powered craft fueled by hunger rather than coal...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests119.su: Difficult to control but uncontested for long-range flights...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests12.des: 直接把植物球放入压缩机的话它会被压个稀巴烂，先进行一下预压缩。
有些植物球会被压碎，注意清理或者再利用处理失败的残次品。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests120.su: Bulky, but comes with storage capability.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests121.de: With heated Basins, you can now automatically make potions.
This might have a few more uses than vanilla.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests123.de: Simply place your post-drilled Breech onto the floor, and introduce it by hand (or automate with Deployers) to a Create Shaft followed by a Screw Lock.
You'll need to cast the Steel Ingots required in a Screw Lock or pour it yourself using a Ring Cast for a slightly reduced material cost!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests124.de: Follow the REI prompts backwards to work your way through drilling an Incomplete Steel Screw Breech.
Sometimes military war game mods aren't so optional after all...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests124.su: If you've dipped your toes into Big Cannons, this is essentially free...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests125.de: Attach the Breech to a Mechanical Bearing. Placing a Cannon Drill with at least enough Extension Poles to propel it far enough into the Breech (when provided with rotational power) will allow you to drill straight through.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests125.su: I am a dwarf and I'm boring a hole.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests126.su: Simply use a Create Press to condense the Fin back to its sturdy makeup.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests127.su: Weaken some Sturdy Sheets in a Grinder.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests128.de: The ruins of the Moon, swallowed and regurgitated... Thrown up into the air like a great beast playing with its food.
With a &6Desh Rocket&r, we can see what lies in the &3Moon Debris&r beyond orbit. Bring your finest gear - there's a terrible aura filling the air here, and things will get hostile very quickly.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests128.su: The Dark Side of the Moon
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests129.de: The Monsters here, corrupted by something living, something evil.
The &3Crystals&r they form when defeated... are clearly not of this world. What caused this damage?
Reality itself seems to disagree with whatever grazed civilisation on the Moon, yet... There's something so beautiful about the scars it left.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests13.des: 你的火箭燃料里可容不下一丁点的杂质，把杂质洗出去。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests13.sub: 从生物质里洗出来化肥
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests130.de: Our modern technology and alien matter, combined to form something of great use.
The &3Pylon&r permits teleportation to a set location, as long as the user doesn't step beyond 256 blocks of it.
Once a &3Pylon&r is active, Right-Click to teleport, or Shift + Right-Click to detonate for a strong burst of knockback.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests131.de: The &3Crystals&r can be formed into a ball for a devastating projectile.
If a Cometball hits an enemy, it will launch them into the air. Throw the &3Cometball&r while looking straight down to hit yourself, allowing for air maneuverablity at the cost of your health.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests132.de: Whatever happened here... it left spores... it formed life...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests134.de: Shimmer-coloured decor that functions in a few recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests135.de: 出门探险前你可以用它储存你的经验值，或者你也可以用它把经验值分给你的朋友！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests136.de: 背包！不过不是普通的背包。
用潜影壳来做潜影盒，把它们摆在地上的时候，它们就像箱子一样可以储存物品。打掉后你可以带着里头的东西走——只占一个盒子！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests136.su: 拿着它的时候就别鬼鬼祟祟的潜行了(；д；)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests137.de: 这些投射物都有不同的特性，把它们都试一次，看看你最喜欢的毁灭工具是哪个！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests137.su: 我给你设计了点……&6特殊弹药&r，你可以用土豆大炮把它们打出去。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests138.de: 第一次右击设定目的地，第二次右击传送到目的地。
这个物品传送范围不限，甚至可以&6跨维度&r传送。不过嘛，用一次就坏了。
我都懒得和你解释这玩意咋合成了，这玩意太麻烦了。要做的话祝你好运喽。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests139.de: You may stumble upon a &dShimmer Heart&r in a storage crate - left behind from cruel experimentation...
To reawaken it would be... cruel...
When thrown into a pool of Shimmer, the &dAwakened Shimmer Heart&r will glow. Globs of Shimmer will chunk together to form a &dPowerful Creature&r. It will not take kindly to you reawakening it.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests14.des: 欢迎来到第3章！之后的任务才是真正的挑战。合成产线会变得越来越长，有的时候只进行基础资源的半自动化甚至全自动化都不太够用，你需要自动化一些合成出来的物品，例如机壳、电子管、导线、齿轮，以及电路板。
尽管如此，月球为你提供了许多十分宝贵的资源来帮助你达成这一目标。界面下半部分的任务线会提供给你不可或缺的思路来管理如此大量资源的物流系统，而上半部分的任务线会带你走进强大的电力世界，向你介绍处理资源的全新工具和方式。这两条任务线将会为你提供自动化生产地球上任何一种资源所需的方法。
克服这些艰苦的挑战，最终你将用这些工具继续探索你头顶的星空。但是注意不要被任务线束缚了手脚：这些任务只是告诉你可以做自动化，不是要求你自动化。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests140.de: 月球的地下可能随机出现&a经验水晶&r湖，在&b液态灵魂&r边上会有一层固态化经验。

&aBudding XP Crystals&r feed off of &bLiquid Soul&r through the sides of the block, producing &aXP Crystals&r on the top and bottom of the block when they get hungry. &bLiquid Soul&r is automatable, so keep those crystals growing!
&aXP Crystals&r can be eaten for &aXP&r, or they can be melted and processed into &aXP Boost&r potions, and various foods that grant large quantities of &aXP&r when digested.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests15.des: 这两条任务线最终会汇集在一点，意味着两条线都很重要，都要发展。
这条线主要发展的是电力和一些特殊机器，在你的大本营周围传输一下动力比较好。并且，尽管这些机器对你的科技线影响没有黄铜任务线那么大，但是随着你深入星空，它们的重要性会愈发彰显出来。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests16.des: Desh can be obtained through crushing Moon Cobblestone or washing Moon Sand.
Moon Cobblestone will generate infinitely from Stone Growth Chambers in their repsective planets / orbits.
Similar processes can be used in future planets to obtain their ores too.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests17.des: Brass Casing is needed for the smartest and most useful of Create machines - Machines with "smart" functionality. It is essential for logistics in large, complicated factories.
Brass Casing is the final tier of casing, at least for Create machines. Future casings from Tech Reborn are more advanced still.
提醒你一下，匠魂的浇注口和机械动力的注液器都是可以自动化的，不要老想着手搓了！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests17.sub: Pour Molten Brass onto Copper Casing to craft Brass Casing.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests18.des: 这两条任务线最终会汇集在一点，意味着两条线都很重要，都要发展。
黄铜这条线会带你进入匠魂和机械动力两个模组的最终阶段，你将获得所有生产线的完全掌控能力。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests18.sub: This wasteland is littered with pipelines... what for?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests19.des: 金石板在许多合成配方中都有出现，但是其中一个合成尤为重要：集成电路板。
许多合成配方都要用到集成电路板。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests2.desc: 动力合成器可以为你合成物品。支持几乎所有工作台配方。
不仅如此，动力合成器可以制作的配方还超越了原版工作台的3x3网格，有大量物品你能且只能使用动力合成器制作。
等等，还有一件事！动力合成器内部的精巧结构甚至可以满足一些小物件的制作需求，就算合成表大小比3x3还小都能做。
还有许多其他的全新合成配方，这本书没法面面俱到地一个个解释。在REI中看看你能做些什么东西吧！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests20.des: 集成电路板可以用来合成各种物品。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests20.sub: Funny you invent circuits before electricity...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests21.des: 机械框架是许多银质店里机器的基础材料。制作更高级的机壳时也会用到。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests21.sub: Those Andesite Casings have come a long way...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests22.sub: In case you didn't know what batteries do...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests23.des: 机械动力附加模组中的轧机已经不是新鲜玩意了 :(
再过不久，特斯拉线圈就会变成你的新玩具。
线材轧机（科技复兴）可以用于生产科技复兴的导线和机械动力附加模组的金属线，并且速度更快，不过没有办法生产机械动力附加的金属棒，所以你的轧机也别急着拆。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests23.sub: Save on some resources this way. Entirely optional.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests24.des: 提取机带来了很多新的处理配方，助你完成自动化。大部分配方都是处理染料的，不过有些染料也很有用。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests24.sub: Increase the efficiency of converting tree Sap into Rubber using an Extractor.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests25.des: 电力机器要么可以让你做一些没做过的事，要么可以帮你把做过的事做得更好更高效。
压缩机可以把物品狠狠地压成板，还可以把有机物转化成燃料。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests26.des: 这是进行太空旅行的三个关键前置条件之一。另外两个条件是火箭零件和组装火箭用的工作台。
如果你想把燃料存到液体储罐里，你需要把燃料单元从分液池上滚过去。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests26.sub: Use that Canning Machine to load pure Biomatter into liquid form.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests27.des: 交流发电机可以将旋转能作为输入，利用磁转子产生电能。
发出的电可以用导线或线缆传输，也可以储存在电池中。许多机器需要电能才能工作。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests27.sub: 想要让发电机发挥最大效能，你需要非常强劲的动力！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests28.des: 连接器可以放置于发电设备或用电器上。放上连接器后，你可以用铜线轴连接它们，传输电力。
铜线轴能够连接的范围有限。如果你想把电传得更远，你可以在平地上放一个连接器做中继。
科技复兴的绝缘线缆也可以用来传电，但是没那么好看，用起来也很笨重。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests28.sub: 你现在生产的电能可以用简单易用的线缆传输了！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests29.des: 潜行右击火箭打开界面，在界面中可以为火箭添加燃料，最多可以添加3桶。话虽这么说，一定记得带一点备用的燃料，谁都不想被困在外太空，被迫流浪。
祝你星际旅行愉快，整个太阳系等着你去探索！
右击火箭可以坐上去。按住空格键一小会，你的火箭就会升空，并显示目的地选择界面。你暂时还不能探索所有行星，不过你的选项还是有不少的。
选择一个目的地之后，你就会坐在着陆器中向行星表面降落。按下空格可以减速。注意不要着陆过快，否则你的着陆器会爆炸，你就回不去了。你要是还不放心的话可以多带几个火箭。F5切换视角可以让你看得更清楚，方便降落。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests3.desc: 你会在许多功能强大的机械动力机器中见到精密构件的身影。每当你做出一个的时候，你都会不由自主地露出笑容。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests30.des: By casting the Fragile Fin, it will be ready to further process into a more stable material.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests30.sub: Pour Molten Gold over a Fragile Fin to create a cast shape.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests31.des: 这些东西可能比不上升级之后的匠魂工具，但是可以用老方法给它们附个魔，然后一直带在身上用，很方便的。
在每个任务中都为你详细介绍了对应工具的用途。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests31.sub: 这些工具没有耐久，可以附魔，但是需要电能来工作！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests31.tit: 我给你准备了一些大宝贝
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests32.des: 红石芯片的频率处理能力使其十分适合用于星际航行。芯片只需要一点处理，就可以进行更加精确的测量和运算。
需要用到导航构件的东西不多，但是NASA工程装配台是其中一个。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests33.des: 戴斯可以用来制作特殊的太空机器。尽管现在可能还用不上，但是戴斯在后续的发展中会十分重要，可以的时候就挖一些吧。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests33.sub: 看起来挺好吃的，是不是
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests34.des: 来，给你介绍一些猪猪朋友。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests35.des: 你可以用气密舱门和固体方块防止氧气泄露出去。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests35.sub: If you have plans to base on the Moon or any other celestial body without Oxygen, you'll need to set up an Oxygen Distributor connected to a decent source of Oxygen.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests36.des: 需要和电力源相邻才能点亮。
制作白炽灯需要煤粉，可以用磨粉机或粉碎轮得到。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests36.sub: 用漂亮的新光源点亮这个世界
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests37.des: 科技复兴的存储方块可以升级，增大存储容量。
下面那条的科技线可以让你直接管理资源产线，而新的存储单元作为资源的最终存储方块再好不过。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests37.sub: 在一个方块里存储128组物品！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests38.des: Evidence of many great technological advances now stand in ruins... There are few signs of any remaining life here.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests38.sub: Uncover the site of a disaster.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests39.des: 焦褐色的桌子！这些东西和焦黑色的桌子类似，但是稍有不同。它们必须放入铸件才能正常工作。
这既是一种限制（比如不能直接浇铸铁栏杆），也是一种可以加以利用的特点（你可以保持红石信号开启，而不用担心出去一趟回来发现箱子里多了10组铁栏杆）
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests39.sub: Only if you like keeping colours consistent.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests4.desc: 粉碎是一个十分重要的工业流程，有许多用途：
1. 它可以把粗矿“粉碎”，变成粉碎矿石，并有额外的产出以及经验。经验颗粒可以随时吸收，不过你后续可能会需要这些经验颗粒……
2. 它是进阶版的石磨。任何石磨能处理的配方，粉碎轮都能处理，而且通常能获得更多产物。
3. 粉碎轮也有一些独有的处理配方：一般来讲，如果一种石头有“沙子”版本，那么大概把这种石头放进粉碎轮就会得到对应的“沙子”。粉碎轮还能从许多不同的方块中提取各种粉末。这一点和磨粉机很像，但是不同的是粉碎轮粉碎的是整个方块，但磨粉机磨的是物品。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests40.des: 这种温热的方块只能在月球找到，你需要用它来制作比小熔化炉更大的熔炼系统。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests40.sub: Find Scoria within the Moon's caverns.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests40.tit: 多收集一些，准备做更高效的熔铸炉
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests41.des: 相比单方块熔化炉来说，熔铸炉可以更高效地熔炼矿物，并且还会产出一些副产物金属。
不仅如此，熔铸炉还可以用作一个能够存储多种流体的流体存储结构，还能和智能流体管道配合使用。也许这并不是管理流体的最好方式，但是对你来说大概会很有用。
关于如何建造这种结构，参阅这两本指南书。注意这个整合包直接跳过了“冶炼炉”的部分，冶炼炉相关的信息写在了灰色的《入门熔炼术》里。冶炼炉和熔铸炉有很多相似之处，这两本书还会告诉你一些关于全新材料和工具升级的信息。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests41.sub: Get yourself a Tinkers' multiblock Foundry
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests45.des: 配方在REI中不显示，反正肯定有用就是了。
（鼠标放在特斯拉线圈上，按U查看配方）
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests45.sub: By using a Create Additions Tesla Coil™, you can electrify these Synthetic Redstone Crystals as a renewable source of Redstone Dust.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests46.des: One slot is all you need, but technology is about having MORE THAN YOU NEED!!!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests46.sub: 到底多少栏位才算够呢？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests46.tit: 这些箱子真的是越来越奇怪了……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests47.sub: Learn the resources you can find on the Moon.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests48.des: 建立一个快速旅行的前哨站应该会很值当，因为星球维度的距离比只有1:2。
而且，在太空里住着真的很酷好不好。
要注意，空间站不自带供氧系统，你需要在空间站落成之后自行搭建，建完之后你就可以尽情在空间站上坠毁你的着陆器了。我开玩笑的，别真坠了。
&6You might be even able to find some structures from a time before us...&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests48.sub: Orbit dimensions have a 1:8 block travel ratio, just like the Nether.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests49.des: 种子油可以通过压块塑形种子得到，可用于生产生物燃油。很多种子都可以用来生产种子油，你可以任选你喜欢的种子做自动化。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests5.desc: 相对于铁套来说算是小小的升级，但是黄铜套有附魔加成，更容易获得神级附魔。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests50.des: 种子油需要和植物材料进行混合才能进一步合成。很多养分都会扰乱化学反应，所以你的选择很有限。
你可以利用已有的树场来自动化树叶，这需要你时不时补充剪刀。
自动产草机也许更简单一些，这样不需要修改你的树场。不过你还是需要用机械手配合剪刀，并且还需要想个办法自动施骨粉才能长草。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests51.des: 将种子油和植物材料在搅拌盆中搅拌，再把它压缩，就可以获得一种有机化合物，并可以进行后续加工。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests51.sub: 跟彩弹射击没什么关系
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests52.des: 用压缩机进行最终处理，闻起来就像金拱门的味道。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests52.tit: 让我们把这堆尸体烧成灰
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests53.des: Biomass can be refined into Biomatter Pellets, a very efficient solid fuel source to power Furnaces and other such machines. It might be worth using some Biomatter for this, or coming back to this recipe once there is excess rocket fuel.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests53.sub: 一种环保的煤炭替代品
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests54.tas: 前往月球玄武岩三角洲
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests55.des: 特斯拉线圈的特别之处在于，它的工作方式和动力驱动的机器类似，但消耗的是电能。
特斯拉线圈的电流很小但是电压很高，可以向物品中通入电流，将其电离成另外一种物品。真不错！
尽管特斯拉线圈的思索界面说它能给物品“充电”，但它实际上并不能。要充电的话，请使用储电盒！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests56.des: 黄铜漏斗的工作方式和安山岩漏斗类似，但是有两点不同：一、黄铜漏斗可以进行物品过滤；二、它们最多可以输入或输出一组物品。
某些特别的装置可以一次处理一组物品，比如批量洗涤、缠魂，和熔炼，不过一次处理一组花的时间更长。
这样一来，物品保险库的用处也更大了。保险库现在可以在置物台上一次输出一组物品，方便你随时存取物品。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests57.des: 还记得没什么用的安山岩隧道吗？在这之前，你只能用溜槽往传送带上输送成组的物品，安山岩漏斗实在是没什么用武之地。
现在黄铜隧道可以用过滤器限制每个出口输出的物品种类。不仅如此，在相邻的传送带上放置相邻的黄铜隧道，这些隧道就可以用平均分配或者轮询调度的方式向不同的支路输出物品，平均地调度资源。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests58.des: 智能溜槽和普通溜槽类似，不过可以用过滤器限制输出什么物品，或是一次输出物品的数量。
它们还能用红石信号开启或关闭，和存量转信器结合使用就可以实现自动丢弃富余的物品。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests59.des: Mechanical Arms can take items off of Belts and Depots and put them somewhere else, including other Depots and Belts, as well as into Funnels.
They're great if setting up Belts is too complicated if you only need to move an item by six feet, or you need items to go onto diverging paths/converging endpoints.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests6.desc: 要制作这个配方你需要一个很大的合成器组。一旦合成完毕，你就拥有了一个完美的火箭发射基地。
你需要两个这东西——无论你去哪个星球，你早晚还得回来，对不对？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests6.subt: 也许不应该在草地上发射火箭
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests6.titl: 我们需要大点的工作台……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests60.des: The Rotation Speed Controller lets you set the speed of rotation. It needs a large Cogwheel on top to work.
It's as useful as it sounds. You'll want a couple of these.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests60.sub: This makes a mockery of engineering.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests61.des: A Redstone Link will transmit a Redstone signal wirelessly. They must be set to receive or broadcast with a Wrench, and the wireless channel is determined by the combination of items in its two slots.
They're lifesavers for anything involving Redstone, and are especially helpful when used in combination with Sequenced Gearshifts and Stockpile Switches.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests61.sub: Great with Sequenced Gearshifts, and Stockpile Switches, and, and, and...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests62.des: Certain Chapter 2 recipes are now simpler. Even if Brass is a bit rarer, the simplified recipes are a huge ease of mind.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests62.sub: The Observer recipes were so cursed!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests62.tit: 简单点，合成的方式简单点
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests63.des: Sequenced Gearshifts let you you specify a sequence of rotations. For example, when it receives a Redstone signal, it can rotate something exactly 60 degrees, regardless of output speed specified.
They can work on Mechanical Bearings. There's also a few items that were actually available to you all along, but don't make a lot of sense to use without Sequenced Gearshifts.

Of course, having blocks move around doesn't help you too much. There is one exception though: you need a way to keep all that air in your Moon base from leaking out, yeah? Until you can build airlocks, Sequenced Gearshifts are the most reliable way to lock air.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests63.sub: These Gearshifts let you overengineer everything!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests64.des: The Grinder is like the Millstone: it crushes things down to a more reduced form.

This Grinder specializes in precision and sharpness. It can efficiently grind up any resources that can fit within it. This improves yields for some objects! There's also unique materials that can only be made from this machine. Granted, most of them are dusts that don't help you out at the moment.

It's similiar to the Crushing Wheel from the bottom path. The difference is that the Crushing Wheel operates on whole blocks, while the Grinder operates on individual items. Sometimes there is overlap between these two machines, however.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests65.des: A LOT of machinery uses Silver Plates. This stuff is more valuable than Gold.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests66.des: There are a few solids that can only be turned into liquids when contained in an air-tight cell. The Canning Machines allow you to do this.
There's very few items that require this though, but there's one you might need.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests67.des: The Gantry Shaft allows you to push connected structures back and forth along a connected "gantry".
Combined with a Sequenced Gearshift, this allows you to create contraptions such as elevators and moving platforms.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests67.sub: This allows you to move things back and forth.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests68.des: The Rope Pulley can be lowered and will attach to connected structures. It can also move structures up and down.
Combined with a Sequenced Gearshift, it can be used to make an elevator, or to vertically transport inventories.

Very inventive engineers might be able to make a quarry with this, as machines like Drills work on structures being moved around via Rope Pulleys much like they do on Mechanical Bearings, Trains, and Cart Contraptions. This applies to Pistons and Gantries too.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests68.sub: This allows you to move things back and forth.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests69.des: The Mechanical Piston can be push connected contraptions forwards. The sticky version can push them back and forth. They resemble regular Minecraft Pistons, although their range can be made longer than their Redstone counterpart.
Combined with a Sequenced Gearshift, they can be used to make elevators. Weird how that works.
(A lowkey practical use for them is pushing blocks made in a Cobblestone or Basalt Generator to a Drill placed in a more convenient spot.)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests69.sub: This allows you to move things back and forth.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests7.desc: 炉——本质上就是蒸汽动力——能够产生强大的能量，别的动力源方块跟它一比就是弟弟。锅炉包含一个需要持续向其中供水的流体储罐，以及锅炉下方需要持续燃烧的烈焰人燃烧室。这个结构十分复杂，建议使用思索功能学习。
你的目标是9级锅炉，和它的投入相比，它的输出可以说非常高效。发展到电力科技之后，你的应力消耗系统可以说是不值一提。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests7.titl: 年轻的工人哟，来试试蒸汽锅炉吧
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests70.des: Rocket biofuel is a difficult process, especially with the technology you have available to you. Automating it will test your factory-building skills, but the stars beckon you to discover a new age within them.
Although you can do this as you complete the chapter, you will need certain tools from both sides of the tree in order to complete this challenge.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests70.sub: 你可以早点开始着手制造火箭燃料产线！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests71.des: The Desh Plate is needed in many manners of space utilities and crafts.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests72.des: Electrum has limited technical applications, mostly for finely-modulated electric currents in circuity that specializes in waves.
It's normally used as an equipment material. Tinkers' tools made with this give you more experience than usual! After all, you did go through a lot of experience to come this far.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests73.des: You can make Nether Grout out of it too.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests73.sub: Hey, did you know that you can make Magma Blocks out of these?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests75.des: Much like what Seared Bricks are to Melters, Scorched Bricks are the foundation of many Foundry blocks.
You will need a lot more of these then you will Seared Bricks, however. Foundries are made block by block, and you'll probably want to build big.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests76.des: Scorched Bricks form the walls of a Foundry. Literally. You place them down in a hollow cube and place the Controller in one of them to complete the multiblock.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests77.des: The Scorched Chute can have a Funnel attached to it and be used to input items into the Foundry. Useful if you have an ore processing setup.
By the way, you can insert items manually via the Foundry Controller, this block is only needed for automation purposes.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests77.sub: For when chucking stuff into the top doesn't work.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests78.des: 你可以用机械动力的管道连接焦褐排液孔，向熔铸炉内输入或从熔铸炉输出液体。
顺带一提，手持桶对着这个方块右击可以手动倒入倒出液体。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests78.sub: 放在熔铸炉侧壁就能用！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests78.tit: 熔铸炉的流体输入输出
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests79.des: These two items can store up to four buckets of any fluid. They can also be picked up and moved around. This has its own uses.
However, their biggest purpose is to act as fuel input to the Foundry. Foundries powered by Lava will melt the fastest with great fuel efficiency. You'll want one in your Foundry.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests79.sub: The Foundry has special power methods.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests80.des: Foundries can be built pretty high. It may be handy to look into them - or even better, have a ladder out of them for when you fall in.
Scorched Ladders can be build as part of the Foundry wall while keeping the multiblock structure valid. Handy.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests80.tit: 有那么点用的熔铸炉装饰
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests81.des: The Grinder is superior at grinding items. Because of this, a few items - even if they can be milled or crushed - will have their greatest yield from this machine.
The tasks above are a few examples.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests82.des: Soul Soil has a surprising number of uses. It's needed for Foundries, Basalt generators, and a special form of processing called "haunting". Huh!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests83.des: The Soul Campfire has a unique property. When placed in front of an Encased Fan, it will begin to "bulk haunt" items similarly to bulk smelting and bulk washing. Items that undergo haunting transform into an alternate or "corrupted" version of themselves. It's really handy for getting stuff that may be a bit hard to find, and has many unusual applications in automation!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests84.des: Most mobs trapped inside an active Foundry will bleed Blood into the Foundry. The Blood can then be cast into balls that function like Slimeballs.

You can't move Spawners in this game, but setting up a Foundry around one you discovered can make for a great Slimeball automation alternative. You can even set up a Train to periodically deliver Blood to your base if the nearest Spawner is far away!
Alternatively, Slime can be automated by automating Lime Dye and Dough, if this setup is too much for you. This quest will accept either approach.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests84.tit: 自动化黏血块或黏液块
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests85.des: You can build a Foundry around a Blaze Spawner, and it'll cook the Blazes into Blazing Blood. Blazing Blood can be converted to Blaze Rods, or used to power the Foundry.
Alternatively, you could just keep the Blazing Blood as an alternative to Lava for powering the Foundry. It is faster at melting!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests86.des: Soul Soil can be washed into Golden Nuggets and very rarely, Quartz. Soul Soil can also be made by haunting sand, leading to a more abudant way to gather sand. You might have a way to automate sand later in this quest...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests86.sub: Not as valuable as silver though.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests87.des: The tasks listed here are a few examples of what can be gained via haunting. Play around!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests87.sub: This isn't magic in a tech pack.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests88.des: Craft a Peculiar Bell with Brass which is a little down the quest line the other way, and then haunt it for a Haunted Bell. This bell has a unique property - when rung, it will show spirits where mobs can spawn at night. This utility is perfect for mob-spawn-proofing your base!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests88.sub: 想知道哪里光照不太够吗？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests89.des: Remember Asurine? What you milled for Zinc? Well, not only does crushing it give you extra Zinc, it will also create "Lazurite Dust". Lazurite, combined with Lava and some Iron, will create Lapis.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests89.sub: 上路科技线告诉你要自动化这个……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests9.subt: 别在开机的时候放Bad Apple了，好吗？
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests90.des: Silver can be obtained by washing the Lime byproduct obtained by crushing Limestone.
It also appears as a byproduct in Desh automation.
Consider creating a Limestone generator if you haven't already!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests90.sub: Just how many uses does Clay have?!?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests91.des: Lava touching Basalt and Blue Ice will create Basalt. The Basalt can then be mined, much like a Cobblestone generator setup.
Basalt can be processed to directly yield many useful resources.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests93.des: Take note of which new recipes are available to make in the near-future by viewing all &6Mechanical Crafting&r recipes in REI!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests94.des: Coal (Carbon) can be mixed with Iron to create very sturdy Steel. The Grinder from the Silver path and the Crushing Wheel can produce an equal amount of Coal Dust.
If you have very little Coal on you, Charcoal can be converted to Coal via bulk haunting.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests94.sub: Don't ingest this, it ain't coal coke.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests95.des: Although you have the means to mix Steel Dust, you don't have the means to turn it into an ingot. Melting it won't work either.
Steel will have a lot more relevance in Chapter 4.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests95.sub: 你之后还会见到这种粉末的。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests96.des: To make blast-resistant Cement, Steel and Lime Dust needs to be mixed together with Concrete Powder.
Clay Dust for the Concrete Powder can be obtained by crushing Limestone, or crushing Clay. The material is too soft for the Grinder to work.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests96.sub: 外面的桶不防爆，防爆的是里面的水泥。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests97.des: Lastly, all you need to do is pour the Cement into a Casting Basin.
Blast-Resistant Concrete is the only material strong enough to withstand the blast of a rocket, while still being cheap enough to obtain in the quantities you need.

That being said, you'll want to build your landing sites out of this. Rockets can blow up if you don't land them correctly, and this concrete block will prevent those mishaps from destroying part of your base.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests98.des: 如果你以前玩过别的整合包，你大概知道匠魂里高等级的合金都需要在冶炼炉或者小型合金炉中制作。这两种制作合金的方法都被移除了。作为替代，你需要在加热的工作盆中混合搅拌制作合金。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests98.sub: Read this if you're a Tinkers' Construct expert.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests99.des: Not only are Integrated Circuits used in many machines in the near future, but much like casings, they are a tiered object. You will create more advanced circuits from Integrated Circuits.
Of course, you can get far with only semi-automating it.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quests99.sub: 电路板对于科技发展还是很重要的！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.title: 3) Remnants of a Lost Civilisation
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests0.desc: A resilient civilisation inhabits Mars... They seem to worship Gold. Find large quantities of it along with Lead and Ostrum in the underground. Buildings, old and new, can be found on the surface.

As you've proven your resourcefulness up to now, the quests will be slightly less thorough, and may not tell you every new tool you gained when you craft a new machine. This totally has nothing to do with two different writers writing different halves of the pack. Nope. Not at all.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests0.subt: 把这当你家建设好了，毕竟这之后游戏难度还在上升……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests1.desc: Access to your new fuel will allow the &6Foundry&r to become &bSUPERHEATED&r!
这个全新材料有3000摄氏度的熔点，未来大部分矿物都可以用它融化，融化后就可以浇筑成锭或者板。而且，紫金在未来造火箭和保护装备的时候非常重要，毕竟靠近太阳的地方环境会很危险。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests1.subt: Let us put that &bHellfire&r to good use, shall we?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests10.des: So, you have pre-emptively applied all the Electrified Pins on the mechanism.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests10.sub: I thought these were assembly items.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests11.des: A simple process to finish the recipe chain, just apply a &6Lead Plate&r and &6Press&r to form your new circuit!
A majority of Tech Reborn machine blocks will be utilising these chips, and they will have uses in later chapters for further tiered items.
Don't slack on your automation! You've made it this far, after all.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests11.sub: A new tier of chips with high demand.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests12.des: The &6Centrifuge&r is an integral tool at your disposal. Use it to turn items, Tech Reborn Cells and more into their base components with a little bit of time and Energy input.
From here, you have multiple paths to branch into, however they will converge eventually, feel free to focus on them one at a time, or all at once!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests13.sub: Electrolysing Clay Dust produces Lithium liquid, which can be utilised to upgrade Red Cell Batteries.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests14.des: &6Molten Iron Cells&r mixed with &6Carbon Cells&r (Obtained by electrolysing Coal or Charcoal) will produce four Steel Dust in a blast furnace.
This is over 2x the efficiency of the prior recipe per resource spent!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests15.des: Crushing Infernal Spire produces Netherite Scrap Debris at a low rate.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests15.sub: 在地下多挖点这东西吧！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests16.des: Semi-automatable Debris! Wow! Along with its usual usages, Netherite can be used to forge some devastating MC Dungeons weapons. If you're rolling in the stuff, Create Deco provides some pricey decoration blocks. - Happy flexing
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests17.des: Now that you've got electrified pins it is time to add them to the chip.
However, they are very small and delicate, which means that human precision is not enough. You will need to apply the pins to an integrated circuit in an assembly line using deployers.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests18.des: A component use in &6Vital Rocket Assembly Parts&r.
Various fluid you've interacted with before, alongside &6Fire-Resistant Fragile Sheet Blocks&r will assemble into this component.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests19.des: 64 Coal Dust in an Implosion Compressor will create a Diamond. Seems steep, but such is the price we pay for automation.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests19.sub: As a bonus for getting this far, here is a block of Liquid Diamond. A treat >.<
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests2.desc: Lithium can be processed from basic Clay balls for a large amount, if you use one of the earlier Clay farms.
A reminder that batteries can be charged in any Tech Reborn machine! The Tesla Coil from Create Additions does not provide this.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests2.subt: 把锂倒进你的红色电池里头做出这个部件。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests20.des: Gold can be found in structures here, but it's important to set up Gold automation using Ochrum!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests21.des: The Piglins worship Gold like a god. Show off your respect by holding a token of faith.
A bar of Gold as a body... nugget for a nose... two little pins for arms... sand it off and... yes, that should do it.
Once you've established a common ground with your piggy kin, you may begin trading.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests21.sub: &6Respect the Piglin's Religion, and they may opt to bargain with you.&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests22.des: Toss a coin at a piglin, like a wish in a well. Piglins love themselves and Gold. Expect big rewards.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests23.des: Pig-Iron can be made by putting a pork chop, an Iron Ingot, and a Gold Ingot in a heated Mixer.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests23.sub: 百度一下猪灵经济世界通货膨胀以了解更多！
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests24.des: Methane has a strange effect on the mind and body. When inhaled, it fogs weak minds, making one suggestable to even the most preposterous of ideas.
...I wonder if it has the same effect on Piglins?
It can be produced by placing lots of decomposable items in an Industrial Centrifuge, like 16 Wood, as an example.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests24.tit: 你让我的脑袋天旋地转……
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests25.des: Piglins love to trade Gold Coins! They can't resist give you lots of goodies in return.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests25.sub: 在火星的栖息地观察猪灵。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests25.tit: 小猪猪~到妈妈的怀抱里来~
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests26.des: Lead acts as any other ore you've seen so far would. It can be &6Crushed, smelted, melted down&r without trouble.
Pockets of Ostrum may catch your eye on Mars, ensure to collect them for further research, I know just the thing to process them, &bbut it will require some real heat...&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests26.sub: One out of two, although the second is still out of reach...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests27.des: &6Desh&r is tough, and requires a Compressor to turn into sheets. However, Lead is highly malleable, so kinetic energy and a big block of Iron will be plenty to form sheets of it.
Simply through it into whatever highly sophisticated Mechanical Press setup you have!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests27.sub: OK, you may use the Press for this one :)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests28.des: Why is there methane in this? Is this ethical?
Either way, Piglin Fortunes unlock a higher tier of trading. It would be very rewarding to automate these. Just throw at a Piglin and they won't be able to resist!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests29.des: Piglins love Gold, so a gift for them should be presented in a Golden Bowl.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests3.desc: A swathe of recipes are available in the electrolyser, from separating Tech Reborn fluids to their base components, to converting items like Clay and Coal Dust into &6Lithium and Carbon Cells respectively&r.
Those two recipes mention at the tail-end of the first sentence are worth knowing, and getting produced already, before you will start using it for further manufacturing.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests3.subt: This isn't a dodgy Astral multiblock, it's a fully fledged block.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests3.titl: 需要：电解器（这次没开玩笑）
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests30.des: A gift to remind the Piglins of their home. They're gonna love this!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests30.sub: Mushrooms are a hell of a drug.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests31.des: The Shimmer Amplifier will play a primary role in the mechanical crafting of Ostrum Engines.
At this point, the remaining costs, being a haul of Ostrum materials and a capacitor should be of no trouble for you.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests32.des: We've gated this rather far into the pack to limit methods of 'free flight', but now is the time. These rocket engine-powered wings can provide you will endless flight (with the accompanying Firework Rockets) as long as you aren't in space.
(...where you will promptly either melt spontaneously or suffocate)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests32.sub: The unfiltered power of the Elytra is within reach. Limitless flight.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests34.des: Sky Stone is then milled or crushed into dust, presenting an infinitely renewable source.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests35.des: 5 Moon Stone and 1 Certus Dust will compress into Sky Stone, usually only obtained in Ad Astra meteors.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests36.des: Three Glowstone and one Sky Stone Dust creates a simple way to renew Sulfur.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests37.des: Sulfur, placed in the Melter or Foundry, can be reduced to its fluid form, and while it isn't too combustible like this, it only requires some basic catalysts to change that...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests38.des: A large amount of the Carbon-based Coal Dust will create a thick, black substance, known to us as Oil.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests38.tit: Adding some dinosaur into that Liquid Sulfur.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests39.des: You will be presented with TWO choices when obtaining Oil.
1: &6Automating it&r, the attached process line involving Sky Stone, Sulfur and Coal will be integral in creating a renewable supply.

2: &6Prospecting! &rAnd by prospecting, I of course mean trudging through the Martian wastelands, in hopes of uncovering surface lakes of Oil. Whilst not a particularly sustainable method, it will for sure allow for your first distillations to obtain a quick headstart.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests4.desc: An upgrade to your humble space-suit. How enticing! This suit will be &6Mandatory&r for exploration on Mercury, as the ambient temperature would rip through your basic suit like kindling.
You'll need a &6Shimmer Amplifier&r and &6Orange Stained Glass&r for these! Take note of the latter as it catches many off guard.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests40.des: A steady supply of &6Biofuel&r, alongside your new stash of &bNitrogen&r can be assembled into an enriching compound.
Refining Agents are used as the catalyst in forming a far more combustive fuel type...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests40.sub: Another use for Biofuel, hope you didnt manually craft that back in Chapter 3...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests41.des: The Distillery is your new best friend for exporting a new fluid type, capable of burning at extreme temperatures.
Using the compementary schematic obtained as a reward from the previous quest, you can place an outline of a structure to use as a baseline when building it.
A fluid (Oil), an item (a Refining Agent), energy and &6heat from Blaze Burners&r will allow the multiblock to operate.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests42.des: &6Lava&r is so outdated, &bHellfire&r is where the action is now.

From now on, many melting recipes are going to require a melting point &6too high for Lava&r to reach. Hellfire on the other hand will cut through and melt these materials like butter with its &b3000 Degrees Celsius&r burning temperature.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests42.sub: Refine 'Hellfire' in a heated distillation tower.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests43.des: You may have already got to work at automating scrapboxes!
In that case, you will be two steps ahead already... for this task, the easiest method of obtaining Saltpeter Dust is to heated mix or centrifuge it out of Rich Soil, which of course comes from this.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests44.des: Washing compost into Rich Soil is the quickest way to progress without relying on those dastardly random ticks.
Do not forget, if you still have a steady supply of pure biomatter going unused, it can be utilised in the more efficient compost recipe, no longer relying on bark or straw!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests45.des: Rich Soil can be placed into a Centrifuge to create large quantities of Saltpeter Dust.

Integral in basic Nitrogen automation, you could start producing it by placing Saltpeter into an &6Electrolyser&r. If you hadn't made it when you produced the first Advanced Circuits, it's advised to create one now!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests45.sub: I'm going to be honest, who on Earth is Peter?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests46.des: We're on a path to reach &6Superheating Potential&r.
For utilisation in a &6Distillery Multiblock&r, a Refining Agent will be required to produce a fluid necessary to accomplish this.
Nitrogen, alongside other goodies, can be assembled into a compound capable of seeping new power into Oil, when used in the Distillery.
Nitrogen can also be sourced from the frigid Permafrost rocks of &bGlacio.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests47.des: Cryo freezing is how we're going to convert &6Prismatic Shards&r into aurorite, a lost fluid from Glacio which can react with certain elements to lower their temperature by hundreds of degrees.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests48.des: Infuse the freezing heat dissipating fluid of Aurorite with Nitrogen to create a form of Liquid Nitrogen which will never heat when exposed to warmer atmospheres and high-tech machinery.
It's in violation direct violation of the laws of thermodynamics!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests49.des: Permafrost, which can be created by compressing Glacio Stone, will melt into a small amount of Nitrogen when heated with a Foundry Basin Lid.

If you've not used the Foundry Basin Lid before, it has a handy Ponder that will guide you on using it. It's simple! Just make sure to use a Blaze Burner and pump the output liquid using a Mechanical Pump.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests5.desc: Not everyone makes it this far, you know.
You are about to assemble your second rocket, utilising all the components made up to this point. Quite a thrill!
Preparing for &6Mercury&r should be of utmost priority. Enemies there will not spare you if you slack, so be sure to get protection on your suit if you haven't already!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests5.subt: Combining everything we have learnt so far.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests50.des: If you need a simple source of &3Hydrogen&r without getting caught up in Tech Reborn processes, try placing some Ice-related blocks into the Cryo Freezer!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests51.des: &bAurorite&r can be synthesised using the &6Prismatic Crystals&r you obtained from either vacuuming the Structured Prismatic Crystals, or crushed at low rates from Glacio Stone.
Reminder that the &6Stone Growth Chamber&r functions in every space dimension as a method to infinitely producing stone types from celestial bodies.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests52.des: Glacio Stone can be crushed, as like any other type of stone you've seen before.

This time, the results will not be of the metal variety, but instead be ice-related products. Prismatic crystals may also appear in your bounty, but beware the rates at which they drop is significantly lower than most other results.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests53.des: Iron, Coal, Copper, &bIce Shards, &b Prismatic Crystals (Unique)
Ice stores at the planet's centre are almost infinite.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests53.sub: Known primarily for its bountiful distribution of Lapis Lazuli, Glacio also contains multiple Overworld ores.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests54.des: They are also automatable from Glacio Stone, at a rather steep price.
The primary purpose you can find with Permafrost is its rich mineral makeup of solid Nitrogen, which we can squeeze out for an easy source of the vital component in Liquid Nitrogen.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests54.sub: Permafrost is easily obtainable from the surface of Glacio, just find a large pocket of Powdered Snow.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests55.des: A fun-sized snack favoured by the whole family. If you are familiar with Create already, this item needs no explanation.

However, for those that DO need an explanation, these can be fed to Blaze Burners to activate a second tier of heat, known as &bsuperheating&r. This will unlock recipes previously out of reach due to their heat requirements.
Blaze Cakes are not your only option, however. Pumping &bHellfire&r directly into a Burner with a Straw will superheat at a similar net fuel usage.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests56.des: They form in large spikes on the surface of the Glacio Wastes, but deep within the crust of the planet, ore pockets of them will form in packed ice towards y=0...
Use a &3Chromatic Vacuum&r to separate the crystalline pieces from the ice it is solidified in.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests56.sub: &bGlacio&r and the &dMoon Debris&r hosts a highly exotic form of Ice.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests57.des: Used in various &6Late Chapter4&r and &6Chapter 5&r recipes, these machine parts consist of Wiring, Steel and a &6Carbon Fibre Mesh&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests58.des: One of the first usages of a &bSuperheated Blaze Burner&r you'll encounter.
Remember, using a straw from &6Create: Crafts and Additions&r will allow you to pump &bHellfire&r directly into burners. Convenient, if a little more space-intensive.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests59.des: We'll be using Advanced Machine Frames a lot from now on in production of new machines.
It would be very handy to set up semi-automation for this.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests6.desc: To survive on Mercury with it's super hot surface temperature, ensure you are wearing the Netherite Space Suit at all times!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests60.des: If you have already been on a field trip to Glacio, you may also notice that Permafrost is a alternative, lucrative source of Nitrogen,
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests60.sub: Utilise a &3Centrifuge&r to extract cells from Saltpeter.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests61.des: Glacio is a frigid celestial body in the &corbit of Mars&r with an overabundance of Ice and Snow.
Surely we can harness this landscape to discover methods of cooling our own creations.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests62.des: Items marked as &6[Fragile]&r are meticulously crafted devices which should never be taken off the production line by workers!
Attempting to hold these within the player inventory will cause them to &6Shatter&r into their base components, at a slight material loss.
Attempt to transfer these items straight from production to storage / mechanical crafters using logistical tools like belts / mechanical arms.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests63.des: Are you still a Hephaestus tool user? I'd expect so, they are better in almost every way.
Some may find the simplicity of being able to use energy as durability relaxing, however, and their impressive mining speed is nothing to scoff at.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests64.des: As with your first rocket, the second will require you to bore a material and create a Screw Breech to use as a base item when forming &6Shimmer Amplifiers&r
The steps are the same, however this time you will be utilising Liquid Ostrum, only obtainable from melting at 3000 Degrees!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests65.des: Pour &6Blast-Resistant Cement&r over the Fire-Resistant Fragile Sheet Blocks you have produced, and give it time to set.
These casings will form the frame of the Tier 3 Rocket, capable of thrusting you towards &6Mercury&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests65.tit: Solid of frame you may be...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests66.des: Place down Fragile Sheet Blocks (Be careful not to step on them!) and &6throw your lingering potion&r over them.
This can be performed in bulk to save on crafting as many potions. Work smarter, not harder.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests66.sub: It's more likely than you think!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests67.des: Upon placing them, you &6may not mine them by hand&r or step on them. Instead, utilising alternative means, such as deployers with pickaxes, AE2 destruction planes, and other forms of block breaking automations will be mandatory.
The same rules apply to its fire-resistant bretheren, so don't waste your effort on a good block by mining it yourself!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests67.sub: Produce blocks of Fragile Sheets, which you used in Chapter 3 to produce the T2 rocket!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests68.des: Through delicate processing of sand-related products, silicon can be made in &6bulk&r rather easily.
If you have been using AE2 up to this point, it is likely you have already made use of it, as a method of printing circuits out of your presses!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests68.sub: Silicon can be obtained from mixing, centrifuging. or electrolysis.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests7.desc: The recipe you've been using so far for Steel Dust is rather low output for its cost.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests73.des: Growing in the &6Moon Debris&r dimension, which can be accessed similarly to the Moon when clicking earth with a T2 rocket, lies a wonderful fruit.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests74.des: Sick of processing all your Biofuel for little result?
Fear no more! &6Pure Biomatter&r in the Distillery, with heated Burners, and Water in the tank will produce a much larger amount of Biofuel &6per item spent&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests75.des: For the price of &610 Ancient Debris&r, a portal from the Moon to Mars can be created, and lit with an Astral Conduit.
A worthy investment, for those who are not interested in using a rocket for every trip. This should make exploring the planet more often viable!

&6WARNING:&r It is advised you be careful, as the portal will always send you back from Mars to the Moon, meaning if you built the portal in the Overworld you may not have a way back anymore! Make sure to always chain Moon portals -> Mars portals.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests75.tit: &6A portal from the Moon to Mars?&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests8.subt: 探索这些气候恶劣的生物群系。
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quests9.desc: Much like certain desktop CPUs, the new chip that's our goal will need pins to connect to its motherboard, whether that may be a washing machine or a high-end gaming PC is irrelevant.
To create pins you will need to put Gold Nuggets into a Rolling Machine, which will result in normal pins. We don't want the normal pins though, we want special ones, electrified ones.
Create these Electrified Pins by putting the normal ones on a depot below a Tesla Coil, which will charge them up.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.title: 4) Piglin Peculiarities
ftbquests.chapter.read_the_questbook.que: 原版的石制/木制工具可以通过用切石机对安山合金进行切石来获得。
有些情况还会用到原版的这些工具，比如“喝啤酒啦”模组中的易货。
游戏早期阶段只能使用匠神（fabric版匠魂）工具！
&6原版工具
不推荐使用匠魂的工作站进行合成，因为这上面的合成得到的物品不会被任务系统检测到。请使用&6Erdragh写的模组中的“工程台”&r来代替工作站，这样就不会被这个问题困扰了！
如果一个任务没有检测到要求的物品，不要惊慌！只要把这个出了问题的物品放到箱子里，然后再从箱子里把它拿出来。这样FTB任务就能检测到了。
解决任务无响应的办法
&6工程台！
在机械动力：星辰整合包中，游戏发展的流程跟你熟知的不太一样。
用常规的燃料喂食烈焰人只会使它进行普通的加热。烈焰蛋糕是一个比较后期的物品，&6直到第4章&r才能用跟以前不一样的方法制作。
&6关于超级加热的问答
尝试建造下界传送门会让你很失望，就像把水倒在用萤石当框架的传送门时一样失望……
&o众所周知&r，下界离主世界已经很远了，两个维度之间不可能再建立连接了。
&2（传送门依然可以形成，但进入之后不会被传送到任何地方。）
跟下界告别吧！
下界是什么东西？（进入存档后自动完成）
&6我的下界传送门呢？
机械动力：星辰整合包仔细地研究了一些被认为是“非传统”的登月方法。
在第二章的结尾可以使用一个&l传送门&r前往月球，实际上这可以被当成是在搭建下界传送门。
月球传送门！
&6不用火箭就能前往月球？
如果你是&6单人游戏&r，退出到主界面之前请先在暂停菜单等待&6大约10秒&r时间来让区块完全地自动保存。&2这个bug在专用的服务器中不会出现&r，这种服务器会进行真正的保存。
&l&3只有在你靠近含有电脑的区块的情况下这种方法才有效！&r
1.18.2的电脑模组有一个区块保存的问题！
&4电脑/海龟区块保存！
每种等级的宇航服都使用MC原版的修复和附魔机制。推荐你打上经验修补的附魔来维修。
这自然不如匠魂方便，然而修复需要的材料如下：
&2普通的宇航服&r=坚固板或者钢锭
&5合金宇航服&r=下界合金
&4喷气式宇航服&r=耐热金属锭
耐久很低？
&6修复我的宇航服！
随着整合包的更新，一些新的内容必须要分享出来。
因此，在这个页面上添加*你*在游玩这个包时遇到的一些问题对我们来说非常重要。
欢迎你自己编辑一些文本，并在Github上提交PR。
（要提交的文件 = read_the_questbook.snbt）
我们在游戏任务内设立了一个问答部分！一些常见的问题一般都可以做出解答，但有时候这些答案并不是那么显而易见。
一些常见的问答！
&6Extended Drawers&r中的抽屉与机械动力里的溜槽/安山漏斗配合使用，在一定程度上可以代替黄铜元件的物流功能。
&6抽屉锁&r也是Extended Drawers中的物品，可以阻止任何其他种类的物品进入上锁的抽屉。
没有黄铜？
&6游戏早期的物品过滤
我们满足了你们的需求！！ 战斗配乐现在可以被关闭，而且我们把开关音乐的设置加入了配置文件。
.minecraft\\config\\astraladditions\\combatmusic.txt
只要把上面那个路径的文件中的值由'true' 改为'false'就可以关闭
开关战斗配乐
战斗配乐
这个整合包的自定义音乐已获得授权，你可以在&6任何你想的地方&r使用他们！
请随意在&6油管视频&r或者跟星辰整合有关的内容中使用，你不会受到侵权起诉。
音乐是由Hesperyd, XETROO, PINS3Y 和 ethanicuss创作的
星辰的音乐信息
&6机械动力火炮&r的流程发生了轻微的变化。
最终等级的枪管的合成材料被改成了&6紫金&r，会在&6第四章&r中获取。
虽然大部分合成表没变，但某些合成配方的材料为了和星辰的流程线匹配做了一些调整。
铸铁需要&6安山铁&r制作。
液态青铜在&6第二章&r后解锁。
钢在&6第三章&r末尾获得。
&6机械动力火炮的调整&r
一般情况下，只有被解锁的章节才会出现在任务书里。
在你完成每一章任务结尾的齿轮形的任务后，下一章就会解锁。
你很快就会知道原因。出来吧，隐藏章节！
&6任务章节被隐藏
> &l&4黄铜漏斗或智能溜槽&r
从一个很大的容器（比如一个巨大的保险库或者很大的箱子）里输出物品会产生大量的MSPT，漏斗/溜槽在使用“列表过滤器”或“属性过滤器”过滤物品时会造成更多的MSPT，增加的比例根据过滤物的数量线性变化。
> &l&4批量处理物品掉落物&r
在置物台或传送带上批量处理物品会改善很多。
> &l&4挤压刷石机&r
&7&o一种利用动态结构方块化可以挤压破坏与动态结构重合方块机制的刷石机(所以称之为“挤压刷石机”)。&r
这样很容易把物品掉落物实体挤的到处都是，挤压刷石机一开机就会使MSPT达到一个很明显的峰值，如果这些物品掉落物实体停留一段时间会达到更高的峰值。
MSPT = 毫秒每刻。MSPT越高就说明服务器越卡。
&6服务器卡顿的一般原因
在v2.1版本村民又开始工作了。以前的跳科技问题已经解决，现在科技复兴的电工和冶金学家职业&6（工作方块分别是科技复兴中的火力发电机和铁质合金炉）&r的村民分别卖红石和机械动力的有关物品。
不再能从村民手中获得钻石齿轮，他们好像忘了如何锻造那些齿轮了……
大规模集中营交易所又回来了！
&6关于村民的问答
匠神的合金需要用&l工作盆&r生产。
熔炼金属要在小的&l&2焦黑熔化炉&r的多方快结构中进行，它会在第二章中解锁。
游戏中期大规模熔炼金属的结构是&l&6熔铸炉&r，在第三章中解锁。
合金要用另一种方式生产！
&6冶金炉控制器被禁用！
在v2.1版本，AE2的样本现在可以合成并使用了。
但也因为这个原因，分子装配室被禁用了。
AE2终于可以释放出它全部的潜力了
&6样板？
刚开始的时候，你可以使用机械动力的&9传送带&r短距离运输物品。传送带很有用，吞吐量很高，但是整个游戏还会用到其他物流方式。
很快你就会解锁&6火车&r！第一章就可以制作火车了，长距离的物流运输需要用到它。火车可以开过传送门甚至可以在未加载的区块中行驶，但是你需要确保你的站台和机器在加载的区块里这样火车才能装货。
再玩一段时间，&3AE2&r将在第三章解锁。AE2是一个全面又强大的模组，推荐你去它的wiki看看&2https://appliedenergistics.org&r！
有太多方法了！
&6物流运输
科技复兴的存储单元默认情况不允许自动化的输入输出。
为了让你的存储单元自动地接受物品传输，点进它的库存，然后点击左侧扳手图标的按钮。
如果要设置输入，选择&l输入&r槽位并把你想要输入的面设置为&9蓝色&r。
如果要设置输出，选择&l输出&r槽位并把你想要输入的面设置为&6橘黄色&r。
&6输出槽&r在UI的右下角。
简陋存储单元，我的最爱
&6我该怎么把物品存入存储单元？
在机械动力：星辰整合包中，游戏发展的流程跟你熟知的不太一样。
&6黄铜在去月球之前不可获得&r，因为烈焰人只生存在月球的“月亮发电厂”结构里，而我们需要用烈焰人加热工作盆冶炼黄铜。
&6你不需要造火箭飞到月球&r，你会发现你很早就能到达月球……（第二章结尾）
没有过滤选项？
&6关于黄铜的信息
ftbquests.chapter.the_trophy_room.quests: The Players were ever-cunning, they used anything to do everything.
What is not recorded will be lost.
Stories of the &kNether&r were lost to time... lost to reality...
A friend; a memoir of all the good times.
The Piglins were cunning enough to leave while they could - and small enough to fit through the portal.
Life isn't always about expanding and increasing profits. Sometimes a good meal is enough to be content.
The Sisters of The End fled their home when it became too uninhabitable. The End is inevitable.
As its flesh was torn apart, the Moon bled pink - The essence of everything.
The Industrial Revolution and its consequences
The Players pushed opposites together and untangled the entangled. Nothing out of reach.
How long ago were we there? How many ages past?

item.createbigcannons.delayed_impact_fuz: This fuze can break through _%s_ blocks before breaking.

logging_tip: Please Read The Quest Book (Hover Over Me!)
logging_tip.hover: 任务书中有推进整合包进度所需的大部分信息——它是你的朋友！使用该物品以隐藏此消息。
material.tconstruct.calorite.encyclopedi: 如血般的红色，就像你的敌人感受到你剑刃的寒锋之后溅出的血一样红。
material.tconstruct.desh.encyclopedia: 各项性能总体上很平均，但包含各种关于挖矿和使用便利方面的不寻常修改。
material.tconstruct.ostrum.encyclopedia: 超神般的耐用性，但由于其缓慢的挖掘速度，挥动起来很痛苦。在矿石开采方面十分有利。
material.tconstruct.ostrum.flavor: 千钧重物，给你拿来做工具？！
material.tconstruct.radiant.encyclopedia: 它就是光芒力量的化身。尽管它在铸造过程中很脆弱，但是它可以带来无与伦比的强化属性、挖掘速度和可供把玩的升级槽。
material.tconstruct.shadow.encyclopedia: 拥有令人不可思议的耐用性，用来制作工具手柄和绑定结简直完美。

tooltip.createastral.orcane.1:
如果你是机械动力新手，那么你可以使用思索或在线指南。
该整合包几乎完全以机械动力为中心。任务书有一些项目，
可以大致了解哪些内容有所改动。你可以选择按照任务书指示
进行游玩，但是，也可以不完全跟着任务线走，所以做
你喜欢的事情吧！
tooltip.createastral.orcane.2:
你可能想知道的一个重大变化——这个整合包中不存在下界，
所以请不要尝试搭建下界传送门，因为它不会起作用
（除非你想拿它做装饰）。所有与下界相关的物品都分布在整个整合包的流程中
（主要是在除主世界外的星球上）
